description: The Topaz Residence SHA Plus offers comfortable rooms with air conditioning. Offering on-site parking, it is 1.9 km from Central Festival Shopping Mall. Other facilities available include a mini-mart. The Topaz Residence SHA Plus is 3.8 km from Rassada Pier and 9.6 km from Royal Phuket Marina. Phuket Airport is located 27 km away. Rooms here feature a private balcony, a flat-screen cable TV and a refrigerator. An en suite bathroom comes with shower facilities. Guests will find local restaurants and bars within a 5-minute ride from the residence.

name: Phuket Marriott Resort and Spa, Nai Yang Beach (SHA Plus+)
address: 92, 92/1 Moo 3, Tambol Sakoo, Amphur, Talang, Phuket City 83110
description: Expect the ultimate comfort at Phuket Marriott Resort and Spa, Nai Yang Beach. Ideal for families, couples and business travelers, our Nai Yang beach resort inspires relaxation with beachfront rooms and private villas, each featuring plush bedding, marble bathrooms, mini-refrigerators, flat-panel TVs and complimentary Wi-Fi. Elevate your stay in a scenic beach villa with a private garden and a 400-meter pool. Relax on our resort's private beach or try out the exciting water activities at Yacht Haven and Royal Phuket Marinas. Reserve one of our dynamic meeting venues, enhanced by cutting-edge AV services, custom catering and skilled event planners. End your day in Phuket, Thailand, with a swim in our lagoon pool, a rejuvenating treatment at our resort spa or delectable fare and creative cocktails at our restaurants and bar. Set on the sands of Nai Yang Beach, minutes from Phuket International Airport, our scenic resort offers guests a serene haven in one of the world's most beautiful destinations.Marriott

name: Indochine Resort & Villas
description: Situated on a tropical hillside overlooking Kalim Bay, this resort offers studios and villas with a fully equipped kitchen. It features a beach club with rooftop terrace and outdoor pool. Indochine Residence & Resort is a 45-minute drive from Phuket International Airport. Offering free parking, the resort is only 2 km from Patong Beach. Fitted with wooden flooring, spacious rooms at Indochine feature contemporary decor. Each room also comes with a private balcony and cable TV. Villas come with a private plunge pool. Guests may play a game of tennis at the resort. Alternatively, a fitness centre with views of the sea is available. IndoChine Waterfront restaurant offers Asian dishes. Drinks and snacks can be enjoyed at the Deli Café and pool bar. Alternatively, the option of in-room dining is available.

name: Peace Blue Naiharn Naturist Resort Phuket
description: Located in Rawai Beach, 2 km from Nai Harn Beach, Peace Blue Naiharn Naturist Resort Phuket SHA Extra Plus provides an outdoor swimming pool and rooms with free WiFi access. The property has a pool bar, all day dining, roof top restaurant and bar, fitness centre, outdoor swimming pool, massage room and sauna and taxi and tour service. The units are fitted with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a kettle, a bath, free toiletries and a wardrobe. Rooms have a private bathroom equipped with a shower and a hair dryer, while certain rooms have a kitchen fitted with a microwave. Guest rooms at the hotel come with a seating area. A continental breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. Guests at the accommodation will be able to enjoy activities in and around Rawai Beach, like cycling and hiking. Free shuttle service to Naiharn beach is available. Around-the-clock guidance is available at the reception, where staff speak English and Thai. Phuket Seashell Museum is 3.5 km from Peace Blue Naiharn Naturist Resort Phuket SHA Extra Plus. The nearest airport is Phuket International Airport, 46 km from the hotel.

name: Courtyard by Marriott Phuket Town
address: 1 Soi Surin, Talat Yai, Phuket City 83000
description: Immerse yourself in the energy of your surroundings at Courtyard Phuket Town. Ideally located near Phanga Road in the city center of Phuket Old Town, our hotel places you near cultural attractions, as well as local dining, shopping and entertainment. The hotel's design concept incorporates traditional Thai arts and crafts, cleverly contrasted with modern amenities. Take a cooling dip and enjoy a meal amidst awe-inspiring views at our pool and bar. Test your Thai boxing skills and keep up with your workout routine at our well-equipped hotel fitness center. Host a memorable wedding or successful meeting in our flexible event spaces, enhanced with modern audiovisual technology and personalized catering services. After a day spent working or exploring Phuket Old Town, unwind in the comfort of your spacious hotel room or suite with plush bedding, a sleek work desk, a flat-screen TV and free Wi-Fi. We look forward to making you feel at home at Courtyard Phuket Town.Marriott

name: Centara Grand Beach Resort Phuket (SHA Plus+)
description: Offering a private beach and an outdoor pool, this 5-star hotel is located in Karon. Its premium amenities include a sauna and a fitness centre. Guests can enjoy a range of massage treatments and beauty therapy at the on-site spa and wellness centre, SPA Cenvaree. There is also free private parking on site for guests travelling with a car. The rooms are air conditioned and feature a mini bar, a telephone and an in-room safe. There are also several rooms especially for families. Guests are able to enjoy a drink at Centara Grand Beach Resort Phuket SHA Plus+'s bar and try international and Asian cuisine in the restaurant. Dining options at the hotel include Lobby Lounge and COAST Beach Club & Bistro. Centara Grand Beach Resort Phuket SHA Plus+ is just a stone's throw from Karon Beach and a short car ride from Patong Beach and Kata Beach. The friendly staff at the tour desk are available to book tours and sightseeing trips in Karon.Revato

name: Chanalai Romantica Resort - Adults Only, Kata Beach - Sha Plus
description: Close to Kata Beach, Chanalai Romantica Resort - Adults Only Kata Beach Phuket offers modern 4-star accommodation in Karon. This elegant resort also provides a swimming pool, and is located within easy driving distance of Phuket Town and Patong. Chanalai Romantica Resort - Adults Only Kata Beach Phuket has a gym with core/stability training equipment, a swimming pool and cardiovascular equipment. The 24-hour front desk provides services such as car rentals and luggage storage, and on-site parking is also available. The rooms are air conditioned and include a mini bar, a private balcony and a refrigerator. All offer a flat-screen TV, slippers and bottled water. The on-site restaurant offers international, Italian and Thai dishes in a relaxed setting. A wide choice of dining options can also be found close by. Chanalai Romantica Resort - Adults Only Kata Beach Phuket is close to Kata Day Spa. The helpful staff at the tour desk are available to book tours and sightseeing trips in Karon.Revato

name: Pensiri House - Sha Extra Plus
description: Pensiri House - SHA Extra Plus is a 5-minute walk from Naiyang Beach. It offers air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi. The property features a tour desk, laundry and car/motorbike rental services. Free public parking is possible in a nearby location. The property is a 6-minute drive from Phuket International Airport and a 15-minute drive from Naithon Beach. It is a 40-minute drive to Phuket Town. Fitted with tiled flooring, rooms are equipped with a cable TV, refrigerator and safety deposit box. Hot shower facilities are included in an en suite bathroom. Some rooms have a private balcony. The restaurant serves breakfast daily from 09:00-11:00 hrs.

name: Anantara Mai Khao Phuket Villas (Sha Plus+)
description: Anantara Mai Khao Phuket Villas is set on Phuket, and offers 5-star facilities, including an infinity pool and a private beach. Popular facilities, such as outdoor tennis courts and free Wi-Fi, ensure a satisfying stay in Mai Khao. The property offers a garden to unwind in, as well as free private parking on site. Facilities include facial and body treatments, plus a beauty centre and a kids club. Villas at Anantara Mai Khao Phuket Villas feature a rain shower, a complimentary fruit bowl and a coffee maker. All are air conditioned and offer a private terrace, a marble bathroom and an iPod docking station. They also have a private garden, luxury linen and a pillow menu. Surrounded by the natural beauty of Sirinat National Park, the property provides a selection of outdoor activities, such as fishing, canoeing and snorkeling. The friendly staff at the tour desk are available to book and organise activities in Mai Khao.Revato

name: Kata Poolside Resort
description: Just a 2-minute walk away from the golden sands of Kata Beach, Kata Poolside Resort SHA Plus offers rooms with a private balcony. It features a pool area with a swim-up bar and kiddie pool. Kata Poolside’s rooms have dark wood furnishings and modern Thai décor. Each room has satellite TV, a safety deposit box, and a minibar. The en suite bathrooms are fitted with a bathtub and shower. Guests can relax on the sun loungers around the pool and enjoy mountain views. Staff at the 24-hour front desk can assist with tour bookings, transportation arrangements, and laundry services. Lobster & Prawn Restaurant serves local, international and fresh seafood dishes. More dining options, as well as convenience stores, can be found around the resort. Kata Poolside Resort SHA Plus is located along Kata Road. It is a 25-minute drive from Phuket International Airport.

name: Anantara Layan Phuket Resort (Sha Plus+)
address: 168 Moo 6, Layan Beach Soi 4, Choeng Thale 83110
description: This modern hotel in Thalang provides free wireless internet, as well as a butler service and a saltwater swimming pool. A swimming pool and a limousine service are just some of the deluxe amenities on offer to guests during their stay. Guests can make the most of the sun on the terrace or enjoy a beverage at the pool bar. There is an in-house day spa to relax at, which features a beauty centre and a sauna, as well as a range of body treatments. The hotel also has its very own gym, Lakeside Pool. The rooms are air conditioned and include slippers, a mini bar and an in-room dining area. All offer an in-room safe, a ceiling fan and a seating area. Guests of Anantara Layan Phuket Resort SHA Plus+ are invited to sample Thai and local cuisine at Dee Plee, or try Japanese dishes at Zuma Pop-up Restaurant. Room service is also available any time of the day. Anantara Layan Phuket Resort SHA Plus+ offers free private parking on site for guests with a car. The helpful staff at the tour desk are available to book tours and sightseeing trips in Thalang.Revato

name: Pullman Phuket Arcadia Naithon Beach (Sha Plus+)
description: "Located just 12 minutes from Phuket International Airport, this Phuket resort commands panoramic views of the Andaman Sea, a peaceful paradise offering ultimate privacy. Pullman Phuket Arcadia Naithon Beach Hotel is situated on Naithon Beach and surrounded by Sirinat National Park, a beautiful harmony of nature and 5-star luxuries. Lounge by one of our two pools, or pamper yourself at the hotel's award-winning Spa. Dine at our restaurants, bars and deli offering a fusion of Thai and Western cuisine. "accorhotels.com

name: Katathani Phuket Beach Resort (SHA Extra Plus)
description: Restful beach holidays await at the award-winning Katathani Phuket, with 6 pools and 6 dining options. Located across from Kata Beach, it features a first-rate spa and tennis courts. Featuring private balconies overlooking landscaped grounds, Katathani’s spacious rooms are fitted with Thai-style furnishings and wooden flooring. Each comes with cable TV and a glass-walled bathroom. Enjoy soothing massages and treatments at Tew Son Spa after an active workout at either of the 2 fitness centres. Other leisure options include water sport facilities, a games room and library. Offering international fare, the 6 dining options at Katathani Phuket range from casual beachside barbecues to fine dining. It features a range of cuisines including traditional Thai, authentic Italian, fresh seafood and oven-baked pizzas. For drinks and small bites, guests can head over to any of the 5 on-site bars.The resort also provides a 24-hour room service and conducts cooking lessons. Katathani Beach Resort is an hour’s drive from Phuket International Airport and a 15-minute walk from entertainment spots. Shuttle services to Phuket Town and Patong Beach are available.

name: Oceanfront Beach Resort
description: Set in Patong Beach, a few steps from Kalim Beach, Oceanfront Beach Resort - SHA Extra Plus offers accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a garden. Offering a restaurant, the property also has a bar, as well as a hot tub. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi throughout the property. The resort will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a coffee machine, a fridge, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a balcony and a private bathroom with a shower. Oceanfront Beach Resort - SHA Extra Plus features some units with sea views, and every room is fitted with a kettle. At the accommodation the rooms come with bed linen and towels. Guests at Oceanfront Beach Resort - SHA Extra Plus can enjoy an American breakfast. You can play billiards and squash at the 5-star resort. Patong Beach is 1.3 km from the resort, while Nakalay Beach is 2.6 km from the property. The nearest airport is Phuket International Airport, 31 km from Oceanfront Beach Resort - SHA Extra Plus.

name: Mandarava Resort And Spa, Karon Beach (Sha Plus+)
description: Mandarava Resort and Spa, Karon Beach - SHA Extra Plus, Karon Beach is conveniently located within a 10-minute drive from Patong Beach, the vibrant nightlife on Bangla Road and Jungceylon Shopping Centre. This resort boasts 5 swimming pools, 5 pool bars, fitness facilities and indulgent spa services. Guests enjoy free shuttle service to Karon Beach, located 700 metres away. The property is a 30-minute drive from Phuket Town. It is a 45-minute drive to Phuket International Airport. All villas at Mandarava Resort and Spa, Karon Beach - SHA Extra Plus are built separately from each other and furnished with contemporary decor. They feature free Wi-Fi, a private balcony and a 40-inch flat-screen cable TV. A minibar and a safety deposit box are provided. An en suite bathroom comes with a separate bathtub and a shower. Guests can arrange sightseeing trips at the on-site tour desk. Other conveniences include a meeting room, a convenient store and a salon. Chom Talay Restaurant serves a wide range of international and local dishes all day. Guests can indulge in home-cooked meals along with breathtaking views of the ocean.

name: The Marina Phuket Hotel (SHA Plus+)
description: Situated in Patong, The Marina Phuket Hotel is located an easy drive from Phuket Town and Kathu. Some of the facilities on offer at this 4-star hotel include free on-site parking and wireless internet. Those staying at The Marina Phuket Hotel are invited to take advantage of the relaxation amenities, which include a swimming pool. The hotel has 200 well-appointed rooms that are accompanied by a range of essential facilities to ensure guests have a comfortable stay. The Marina Phuket Hotel's restaurant is open for breakfast, lunch and dinner and provides a suitable place for those who wish to stay close to everything the property has on offer. The hotel has easy access to Patong Beach. Banzaan Fresh Market, Soi Bangla and Jungceylon Shopping Center are a short walk away.Revato

name: Karon Sea Sands Resort
description: LOCATION Phuket, also known as ‘the pearl of the Andaman Sea’, is one of the most famous holiday spots in the world. The hotel lies by the white sand of Karon beach, surrounded by gardens and close to Patong beach, as well as the nearby leisure centres. ROOMS All accommodation units feature air conditioning and a bathroom. Bathrooms with wheelchair access can also be booked. Most rooms feature a balcony or terrace. Each accommodation unit features a double bed or a king-size bed. A safe and a minibar also feature. A mini-fridge and tea and coffee making equipment are provided as standard. Convenient features include internet access, a telephone, a TV and wireless internet access. Wheelchair-accessible accommodation units are also bookable. In the bathrooms, guests will find a shower, a bathtub and a hairdryer. RESTAURANT Navrang Mahal restaurant serves traditional Northern Indian dishes, while Thai and Chinese dishes are available at Tom Yam Kung. Refreshing beverages are offered at the Lobby Lounge and Pool Bar AMENITIES The establishment comprises a total of 87 accommodation units. Guests of the establishment are welcomed in the lobby, which has a 24-hour reception and a 24-hour check-out service. Lift access is provided to the upper floors. Services such as a cloakroom and currency exchange facilities make for a comfortable stay. Internet access (for a fee) and wireless internet access (for a fee) are available in the public areas. Gastronomic options include a restaurant, a breakfast room, a café and a bar. Guests can buy holiday mementos from the souvenir shop. Shopping facilities are available. A garden is among the features contributing to a pleasant stay. Additional services include medical assistance, room service and a laundry. Active guests can make use of the bicycle hire service to explore the surrounding area (for a fee). The establishment offers an outdoor pool and a children's pool. The sun loungers and parasols on the sun terrace offer a great place to unwind. A hot tub provides an opportunity for relaxation. Various refreshing drinks are available from the poolside bar. Leisure options at the establishment include golf, a gym, a spa and a sauna, or for a fee, massage treatments.WebBeds

name: Kamala Beach Estate
description: Only a 5-minute walk from Kamala Beach, Kamala Beach Estate Resort - SHA Extra Plus offers spacious suites with private balconies which overlook the Andaman Sea or garden. It has three pools and a private beach for you to choose from. Free WiFi is available in rooms and the lobby. Suites at Kamala Beach Estate Resort - SHA Extra Plus feature a living room, kitchen and dining room. Each suite is equipped with air conditioning, a private bathroom and satellite TV. A seating area and sundecks are provided. Although Kamala Beach Estate Resort does not have a restaurant we provide grocery shopping services. The team can also order quickly from many of the restaurants nearby, for breakfast, lunch or dinner to suit any budget. Guests can rent a kayak or take a dip in Kamala Beach Estate Resort - SHA Extra Plus's garden pool. The resort offers laundry services and free parking. Staff can arrange trips and activities for guests. Located between Bang Tao Beach and Patong Beach, Kamala Beach Estate Resort - SHA Extra Plus is 35 km from Phuket International Airport.

name: Sino Inn Phuket Hotel - Sha Plus
description: Just a 10-minute drive from Phuket Old Town, Sino Inn provides stylish private and dormitory rooms with air-conditioning and free Wi-Fi. The hotel features a tour desk, which organises excursions to tourist attractions. Sino Inn Phuket Hotel is located a 5-minute drive from Rang Hill and 30 minutes from Patong and Kamala Beaches. It is a 45-minute drive from Phuket International Airport. All rooms are fitted with a balcony, a cable TV and an en suite bathroom with hot shower facilities. They provide air conditioning and a free minibar as well. For guests’ convenience, the hotel provides luggage storage facilities.

name: Sugar Marina Resort - Art - Karon Beach (SHA Plus+)
description: Sugar Marina Resort - Art - Karon Beach SHA Plus+ is situated in Karon and offers free wireless internet. It provides a gym, as well as an outdoor pool, a sun deck and a kids club. The hotel treats guests to a range of leisure amenities, including a playground and Swimming Pool. There is also free public parking on site for those travelling with a car. All rooms are air conditioned and equipped with a refrigerator and a hair dryer. Start each morning with an American breakfast, and enjoy international and local meals at Kiri Burger & Grill. A variety of cafés and restaurants are also found in close proximity to the property. The hotel is a 10-minute walk from Wat Suwan Khiri Khet, and a 20-minute drive from Patong. The helpful staff at the tour desk are available to organise tours and activities in Karon.Revato

name: Sai Rougn Residence - Sha Extra Plus
description: Stop at Sai Rougn Residence to discover the wonders of Phuket. The hotel has everything you need for a comfortable stay. Facilities like free Wi-Fi in all rooms, grocery deliveries, daily housekeeping, 24-hour security, taxi service are readily available for you to enjoy. Guestrooms are fitted with all the amenities you need for a good night's sleep. In some of the rooms, guests can find television LCD/plasma screen, complimentary instant coffee, complimentary tea, free welcome drink, mirror. Entertain the hotel's recreational facilities, including hot tub, golf course (on site), golf course (within 3 km), outdoor pool, spa. Sai Rougn Residence combines warm hospitality with a lovely ambiance to make your stay in Phuket unforgettable.priceline.com

name: Maiiam Bungalows Kata Beach
description: Maiiam Bungalows Kata Beach has an outdoor swimming pool, garden, a restaurant and bar in Kata Beach. This 3-star hotel offers room service, a concierge service and free WiFi. The property is non-smoking and is situated 400 metres from Kata Beach. At the hotel the rooms come with air conditioning, a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen, towels and a terrace with pool view. All rooms will provide guests with a wardrobe and a kettle. Kata Noi Beach is 1.1 km from Maiiam Bungalows Kata Beach, while Karon Beach is 1.6 km from the property. The nearest airport is Phuket International Airport, 45 km from the accommodation.

name: Avista Hideaway Phuket Patong - MGallery (Sha Plus+)
description: Discover serenity at a tranquil hillside sanctuary near Patong Beach. 150 Thai-inspired rooms & suites offer pool, Andaman Sea & mountain views. This boutique Accor Phuket Patong hotel features a rejuvenating spa with free wellness classes, multiple dining options, including two rooftop restaurants & bar, and three pools with swim-up bars. Craft your Stories that Stay and discover the best 5-star resort in Phuket and Accor Phuket accommodation close to Phuket's best beaches, nightlife and sightseeing.accorhotels.com

name: Maikhao Dream Villa Resort and Spa Centara Boutique Collection (SHA Plus+)
description: Situated in Mai Khao, Maikhao Dream Villa Resort and Spa Centara Boutique Collection SHA Plus+ provides stylish 4-star accommodation, as well as a private beach, a swimming pool and a sauna. The air-conditioned rooms feature plasma TVs and free Wi-Fi access. Guests can soak up the sun on the terrace or have a drink at the lounge bar. Guests can also enjoy free public parking on site. It also has a fitness centre with a swimming pool. The hotel provides 22 rooms, each with a private balcony, a spa bath and slippers. Each has a bathroom that offers bathrobes and a hair dryer. On-site dining options include a restaurant, which is a convenient spot to enjoy a meal. In the evening, guests can relax in the cosy lounge bar. Phuket International Airport is a 25-minute drive from Maikhao Dream Villa Resort and Spa Centara Boutique Collection SHA Plus+. Those wishing to explore the region can also visit Sa Khu, situated an easy drive from the property.Revato

name: Wyndham Grand Nai Harn Beach Phuket (SHA Plus+)
description: Thank you for choosing our Wyndham Hotels and Resort. Wyndham Hotels and Resorts is an upscale, full service brand with properties located in key business and vacation destinations across the world. It offers the comfort and amenities you would expect in a world class hotel, including beautifully appointed public areas, thoughtfully detailed guestrooms and distinct dining options. Business locations feature meeting space flexible for large and small meetings, as well as business centers and fitness centers. Many resorts offer golf, tennis, beautiful beaches, spas and more. Wyndham Nai Harn is Phuket's newist stylish Upscale International resort. A contemporary resort for the discerning leisure and business traveler. Located in Nai Harn Beach voted as one of Phukets best beaches and close to Rawai village shopping, restaurants and beach and Promthep Cape. Approximately 60 minutes from Phuket International Airport and 30 minutes to Phuket Town City centre. The hotel also offers guests 10 pools, 5 FB outlets, Meeting facilities, a well equipped fitness and wellness centre including spa, sauna, steam room and Kids Club.priceline.com

name: Royal Embassy Resort
description: A 10-minute walk to peaceful Kamala Beach, The Pe La Resort, Phuket offers 4-star accommodation in a tropical landscape. It features 2 spectacular outdoor pools, a spa bath and free Wi-Fi. The resort provides all guests with complimentary daily transfers to Kamala Beach. The Pe La Resort, Phuket is 9 km from the popular Patong Beach and the various entertainment night spots at Bangla Road. Convenience stores and banks can be found within a 5-minute walk. It is 19 km from Phuket International Airport. Spacious rooms feature modern furnishings and a private balcony or a patio overlooking the pool and the garden. They are conveniently situated around the hotel’s pools. A safe, minibar and tea/coffee making facilities are provided for guests’ convenience. Motorbike and car rental services are provided for guests to explore Phuket Island or book a tour from the on-site tour desk. Free private parking is available. The restaurant serves fresh seafood dishes, as well as Thai and European cuisine. Fruit shakes and cocktails can be enjoyed at the lounge or around the pool.

name: Tp House@naka
address: 97/322 S.Wirat Hong Yok, T. Wichit, Phuket City 83000
description: No description found

name: JW Marriott Phuket Resort & Spa (SHA Plus+)
description: Plan an unforgettable escape to our Phuket, Thailand beach hotel. JW Marriott Phuket Resort & Spa is a 5-star, family-friendly resort just steps from Mai Khao Beach. From our beachfront resort in Phuket, Thailand, enjoy easy access to the islands of Phang Nga Bay, Old Town Phuket and the Royal Phuket Marina. Resort guests are treated to an award-winning spa, three outdoor pools, a modern fitness center and activities such as Thai cooking classes. Plan your special occasion in our beachfront hotel in Phuket, Thailand's indoor and outdoor venues with advanced technology, custom catering and dedicated event planners. Relax in family-friendly hotel rooms, suites and villas filled with five-star amenities like plush bedding, marble bathrooms, 24-hour room service, free Wi-Fi and outdoor space overlooking tropical gardens or the ocean. Select resort rooms have whirlpool tubs, extra living space and private pools. Create lasting memories at JW Marriott Phuket Resort & Spa in Thailand.Marriott

name: On The Hill Karon Resort
description: Set in Karon Beach, 400 metres from Karon Beach, On The Hill Karon Resort offers accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a garden and a terrace. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, a kids' club and room service, along with free WiFi. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk and babysitting service for guests. All guest rooms at the resort come with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. The units will provide guests with a desk and a kettle. The daily breakfast offers continental, American or Asian options. On The Hill Karon Resort offers a children's playground. You can play table tennis and darts at this 3-star resort, and the area is popular for snorkelling. Phuket Simon Cabaret is 2.9 km from the accommodation, while Jungceylon Shopping Center is 4.9 km from the property. The nearest airport is Phuket International Airport, 39 km from On The Hill Karon Resort.

name: Limburi Hometel
description: Ideally located in the prime touristic area of Patong, Limburi Hometel promises a relaxing and wonderful visit. The property features a wide range of facilities to make your stay a pleasant experience. Free Wi-Fi in all rooms, Wi-Fi in public areas, car park, room service, airport transfer are there for guest's enjoyment. Television LCD/plasma screen, internet access – wireless, internet access – wireless (complimentary), non smoking rooms, air conditioning can be found in selected guestrooms. The hotel offers various recreational opportunities. For reliable service and professional staff, Limburi Hometel caters to your needs.Agoda

name: Blu Monkey Bed & Breakfast Phuket (Sha Plus+)
description: A 5-minute drive to the popular view point of Khoa Rang, Blu Monkey Bed & Breakfast Phuket Phuket offers stylish rooms with a private balcony and free Wi-Fi. Equipped with a 24-hour front desk and a tour desk, the hostel is a 15-minute drive to Central Festival Department Store and Rassada Pier. The property is a 20-minute drive to Promthep Cape and a 30-minute drive to Patong Beach. Phuket International Airport is a 50-minute drive away. Fitted with hardwood floor, fully air-conditioned rooms at Blu Monkey Bed & Breakfast Phuket are tastefully furnished with neutral tone décor and graphic murals. Each room features a flat-screen cable TV, a desk and a refrigerator. A private bathroom comes with free toiletries and shower facilities. Guests can easily find local restaurants, located within a 3-minute walk from the hostel.

name: B2 Phuket Premier Hotel
description: No description found

name: The Besavana Phuket - Sha Extra Plus
description: The Besavana Phuket is a hotel set in Old Phuket Town. This 3-star hotel offers free WiFi. Thai Hua Museum is 90 metres away and Chinpracha House is a 3-minute walk from the hotel. At the hotel rooms come with a balcony. The private bathroom is equipped with a shower and free toiletries. Guest rooms at The Besavana Phuket have air conditioning and a desk. The accommodation offers a year-round outdoor pool. Old Phuket Town is 200 metres from The Besavana Phuket. The nearest airport is Phuket International Airport, 26 km from the property.

name: Cool Residence
address: 24/268 Soi Suksanti, Maeluan Road, Phuket City 83000
description: Cool Residence is a 5-minute drive from Central Phuket Festival and a 20-minute drive from Chalong Temple. It offers free parking and free Wi-Fi access in the entire hotel. Air-conditioned guest rooms are fitted with a fridge, tea/coffee making facilities and cable television. The en suite bathroom comes with toiletries and shower. Cool Residence is a 25-minute drive from Patong Beach, Rassada Pier and Chalong Pier. It is a 35-minute drive from Phuket Airport. Luggage storage and safety deposit facilities can be found on site.

name: V Villas Phuket - MGallery (Sha Plus+)
address: Moo 8 Ao Yon Road Vichit Muang, Phuket City 83000
description: Located 39 metres above pristine and secluded Ao Yon Bay and immersed into nature, an exclusive pool villas resort with 24 hours butler service, European and Thai Coastal cuisine, world-class rooftop bar with panoramic view as well as Spa & wellness program. V Villas Phuket offers guest unparalleled privacy and indulgence.accorhotels.com

name: The Slate (Sha Plus+)
address: 116 Moo 1 Tambol Sakhu, Talang, Phuket, Sakhu 83110
description: The Slate, Phuket presents industrial chic design set against the beautiful natural backdrop of Nai Yang Beach and Andaman Sea. Offering beachfront rooms, it also has a rainforest spa and 3 outdoor pools, one is open for family while the other 2 pools are for adults only. Uniquely decorated with original art pieces and locally crafted furnishings, the air-conditioned rooms feature rich wood and cool stone accents. A flat-screen TV, free Wi-Fi and bottled water are included in all rooms. The Slate, Phuket is just 5 minutes' drive from Phuket International Airport. It is a 10-minute drive from Blue Canyon Golf Course and Mission Hills Golf Club. Coqoon Spa offers ultimate relaxation with body massage and facials in The Nest, a private treatment room suspended mid-air like a bird nest. For a refreshing workout, the fitness centre provides yoga, pilates and Muay Thai classes. Guests may experience the charm of Thailand with the hotel's Thai cooking classes, language lessons and Weekend Market day trips. There is also a dive centre and kitesurfing centre next to the hotel. Five dining options leave guests spoilt for choice, serving everything from a breakfast buffet to fresh seafood barbecue dinners. Tongkah Tin Syndicate provides a snooker hall and international whiskeys.

name: The Blanket Hotel Phuket Town (SHA Plus+)
description: Located within 1.4 km of Thai Hua Museum and 1.5 km of Chinpracha House, The Blanket Hotel Phuket Town - SHA Plus provides rooms in Phuket Town. With free WiFi, this 4-star hotel offers a shared lounge and a concierge service. The hotel features family rooms. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a wardrobe, a kettle, a fridge, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At The Blanket Hotel Phuket Town - SHA Plus each room is equipped with bed linen and towels. Breakfast is available daily, and includes continental, American and Asian options. Prince of Songkla University is 6.2 km from the accommodation, while Chalong Temple is 10 km away. The nearest airport is Phuket International Airport, 31 km from The Blanket Hotel Phuket Town - SHA Plus.

name: The Frutta Boutique
description: The Frutta Boutique is a 5-minute drive from Patong Beach and Jungceylon Shopping Mall. It offers modern air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi. Staff at the 24-hour front desk can assist guests with airport shuttle service. The hotel is a 10-minute drive from Bangla Road. It is a 25-minute drive from Phuket Town and Phuket Bus Terminal 2. Phuket Bus Terminal 1 is a 30-minute drive from the hotel while Phuket International Airport is a 45-minute drive away. Each room is fitted with a flat-screen cable TV, safety deposit box and telephone. Hot shower facilities are included in an en suite bathroom. Some rooms have a private balcony. For guests’ convenience, the hotel provides a variety of services including tour desk, laundry and luggage storage. Free public parking is possible in a nearby location. Guests can enjoy Thai and international dishes at the hotel’s restaurant. Room service can be arranged upon request.

name: Silver Resortel
description: Just a 2-minute walk from Patong Beach and just a few minutes away from Jungceylon Shopping Centre it offers air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi and Free Beach towel every day. All non-smoking rooms are simply furnished and come with Free Wi-Fi, cable TV, minibar and safety box. The private bathroom comes with a shower. We have a pharmacy shop and currency exchange shop service in front of the hotel every day.

name: Ocean Rock Kalim
description: Situated in Patong Beach in the Phuket Province region and Kalim Beach reachable within 1.4 km, Ocean Rock Kalim features accommodation with free WiFi, barbecue facilities, a rooftop pool and free private parking. The aparthotel provides guests with a terrace, sea views, a seating area, a flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a fridge, and a private bathroom with a bath or shower and a hair dryer. A stovetop, a minibar and kitchenware are also available, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. A car rental service is available at Ocean Rock Kalim. Patong Beach is 1.8 km from the accommodation, while Patong Boxing Stadium is 3.9 km from the property. The nearest airport is Phuket International, 33 km from Ocean Rock Kalim, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Lotus Hotel Patong
description: Lotus Hotel Patong is 600 metres from Bangla Road. It offers rooms with air-conditioning and free Wi-Fi. The hotel features a tour desk and business centre. The hotel is 200 metres from Jungceylon Shopping Mall. Phuket Airport is located 24 km away. Rooms come with a flat-screen cable TV, electric kettle and refrigerator. They also have a safety deposit box and desk. Shower facilities are included in an en suite bathroom. Some of the rooms have a balcony. Staff at the 24-hour front desk can assist guests with shuttle service, car rental and luggage storage. Local and international restaurants can be found within a 3-minute walk.

name: Baan Krating Phuket Resort
description: Baan Krating Phuket Resort -SHA plus certified is located along Ao Sane Beach, a 15-minute walk to Phuket City and Nai Harn Beach. The resort offers a restaurant, outdoor pool and free parking. The air-conditioned rooms are equipped with internet access, a satellite TV. A private terrace offers views of the ocean or forest. The resort features Thai massage, a pool table and laundry services. Baan Krating All-Day Dining Restaurant serves international and Thai cuisines. Guests can enjoy drinks and sunset views at the resort’s bar. Baan Krating Phuket Resort -SHA plus certified is a 90-minute drive from Phuket International Airport.

name: The Chilli Patong Beach Hotel
description: With a stay at The Chilli Patong Beach Hotel in Patong, you'll be near the beach, a 4-minute walk from Bangla Road and 12 minutes by foot from Patong Beach. Featured amenities include a 24-hour front desk, multilingual staff, and luggage storage. Self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.Hotels.com

name: Access Resort & Villas
description: The uniquely designed Venice-style Access Resort in Phuket is well located, only a 10-minute walk or 3-minute ride from the beautiful Karon Beach. Guests enjoy a one-way shuttle service from the property to Karon Beach. Free WiFi access is available in the lobby and restaurant areas. Every room features direct pool access. Room service arrives by Thai boat rowed by the friendly staff. Enjoy direct pool access from each terrace and excellent cocktails at the swim-up bars in a resort which is as special as its location. The relaxation offered by 5 outdoor free-form pools is perfectly complemented by many types of massage and a full range of treatments offered at The Access Spa. Enjoy a game of billiards and make the most of the games room, or take a cooking course and then eat your menu. Conference rooms are available for all business and social occasions. The property is a 20-minute drive to Patong and a 30-minute drive to Central Festival. Phuket Airport is a 1-hour drive away. International cuisine is served at restaurant between 06:30-23:00 hrs.

name: Action Point Fitness Resort
description: Action Point Wellness and Fitness Resort is a 5-minute drive from Nai Harn Beach. It offers modern air-conditioned rooms with a balcony and free WiFi. The resort features a rooftop pool with a spa bath. Fitness centre is also available. Free private parking is possible on site. The resort is a 15-minute drive to Phromthep Cape. It is a 20-minute drive to Central Festival Department Store. It is a 1-hr drive from Phuket International Airport. At Action Point, guests can enjoy a massage, yoga or Thai boxing. There are also total fitness, weight loss and yoga programmes offered. Rooms are fitted with a flat-screen cable TV, safety deposit box and refrigerator. En suite bathrooms are equipped with a rain shower, slippers and bathrobes. Guests can enjoy Thai and European cuisines at the restaurant. Low calorie meals and detox courses are also available.

name: Shanti Lodge Phuket
description: With a stay at Shanti Lodge Phuket in Chalong, you'll be a 3-minute drive from Chalong Pier and 6 minutes from Phuket Zoo. This hotel is 2.4 mi (3.8 km) from Chalong Bay and 3.4 mi (5.5 km) from Big Buddha. Take advantage of recreation opportunities such as an outdoor pool or take in the view from a terrace and a garden. Additional features at this hotel include complimentary wireless Internet access, tour/ticket assistance, and a picnic area. Getting to nearby attractions is a breeze with the area shuttle (surcharge). Featured amenities include a business center, dry cleaning/laundry services, and luggage storage. Free self parking is available onsite. At Shanti Lodge Phuket, enjoy a satisfying meal at the restaurant. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at the bar/lounge. Make yourself at home in one of the 22 individually decorated guestrooms. Complimentary wireless Internet access is available to keep you connected. Conveniences include safes and desks, and housekeeping is provided on a limited basis.FarePortal

name: Pullman Phuket Panwa Beach Resort (Sha Plus+)
description: Nestled on the picturesque shores of Markham Bay, the resort offers sweeping views of the Andaman Sea. With the airport just 45 minutes away and 20 minute-drive to Phuket Town, the hotel is ideally located to explore the many attractions on Phuket island.accorhotels.com

name: Stay Wellbeing & Lifestyle Resort (Sha Plus+)
address: Soi Suksan2, Wiset Rd., T.Rawai, A.Muang Phuket, Phuket City 83130
description: Situated in Rawai Beach, 1.6 km from Chalong Beach, Stay Wellbeing & Lifestyle Resort features accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a garden and a terrace. With free WiFi, this 5-star resort offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. Some rooms at the property have a balcony with pool view. Rooms include a private bathroom, while certain rooms have a kitchen with a fridge. A Full English/Irish, Italian or American breakfast is available each morning at the property. At the resort you will find a restaurant serving French, Italian and Mediterranean cuisine. Vegetarian and vegan options can also be requested. Stay Wellbeing & Lifestyle Resort offers a children's playground. Chalong Pier is 3 km from the accommodation, while Chalong Temple is 5.6 km from the property. The nearest airport is Phuket International Airport, 42 km from Stay Wellbeing & Lifestyle Resort.

name: Novotel Phuket City Phokeethra (Sha Plus+)
description: Novotel Phuket City Phokeethra, in Phuket's CBD, is near colorful Phuket Old Town, sharing its charming Sino-Portuguese architecture, authentic local cuisine, street art and vibrant Thai markets. Only 10 minutes from Rassada Pier, gateway to the islands.accorhotels.com

name: Bell Lifestyle Hostel Phuket
address: 4031, Tambon Sa Khu, Amphoe Thalang, Choeng Thale 83110
description: No description found

name: The Vijitt Resort Phuket (SHA Plus+)
description: Made up of spacious stand-alone Thai villas besides the sea, The Vijitt Resort Phuket - SHA Extra Plus provides free WiFi and a beach-facing infinity pool. A free scheduled shuttle to Phuket Town is provided. Located on Friendship Beach (Tidal Beach) in Rawai, the resort stretches over 18 acres and presents panoramic views of Chalong Bay, Cape Panwa and Coral Islands. It is less than 6 km from Kata View Point and Chalong Beach. Beautifully decorated in teak wood furnishings, the air-conditioned villas are equipped with a flat-screen TV.The large en suite bathroom has a bathtub and bathrobes. Private treatment rooms and relaxing massage therapies can be enjoyed at the spa. Guests can also exercise at the gym or arrange island day trips at the tour desk. An international breakfast is served daily at The Savoury, while traditional Thai cuisine can be enjoyed at Baan Vijitt. Premium wine from The Wine Cellar can accompany any meal. Throughout the day, light refreshments are available at The Beach Bar.

name: I Pavilion Hotel (Sha Plus+)
address: 133 Satoon Road Muang District Phuket, Phuket City
description: A 5-minute walk from Phuket Old Town, iPavilion Hotel Phuket features an outdoor pool and free WiFi throughout the residence. Its rooms offer large windows with mountain views. Located beside the Phuket District Office, iPavilion is located within a 1-hr drive from the famous Patong Beach and a 45-minute drive from Phuket International Airport. With a short walk, guests will find a bus stop with chargeable airport shuttles that takes guests directly to the airport every hour. The heart of Phuket Town is a 15-minute walk away. Offering modern decor and fitted with tiled flooring, rooms at iPavilion Phuket are equipped with modern amenities including air conditioning and cable TV. Private bathrooms come with hot shower facilities and a bathtub. Room service is included. Guests can dine at the hotel’s restaurant, which serves daily à la carte and Asian-style buffet meals. Vegetarian dishes are also available upon request. Drinks and light snacks can also be purchased at the reception area 24 hours a day.

name: Recenta Express Phuket Town
description: Recenta Style Phuket Town - SHA Plus provides accommodation in Phuket Town near Thai Hua Museum and Chinpracha House. Featuring a fitness centre, the 3-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The hotel offers city views, an outdoor pool and a 24-hour front desk. All guest rooms at the hotel come with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a safety deposit box. At Recenta Style Phuket Town - SHA Plus the rooms are equipped with bed linen and towels. A continental breakfast is available every morning at the accommodation. Prince of Songkla University is 6.5 km from Recenta Style Phuket Town - SHA Plus, while Chalong Temple is 9.1 km from the property. The nearest airport is Phuket International Airport, 32 km from the hotel.

name: The Crib Patong
description: The Crib Hotel is 600 metres from Bangla Road. It offers modern air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi. The hotel is equipped with an outdoor pool, fitness centre and tour desk. The hotel is 300 metres from Jungceylon Shopping Centre and a 15-minute walk from Patong Beach. It is a 1-hr drive from Phuket Airport. Rooms are fitted with a flat-screen cable TV, refrigerator and safety deposit box. Shower facilities are included in an en suite bathroom. Staff at the 24-hour front desk can assist guests with airport transfer and shuttle service. Free public parking is possible on site. Local dining outlets can be found within a 5-minute walk.

name: Chanalai Hotels & Resorts
description: Offering a swimming pool and a rooftop terrace, Chanalai Hillside Resort Karon Beach Phuket is a luxurious place to stay in Karon. Guests can also make the most of free internet access throughout the property. This modern resort offers a kids pool, an express check-in and check-out feature and meeting rooms. The 24-hour front desk provides services like car rentals and luggage storage, and on-site parking is also available. The rooms are air conditioned and include a private balcony, a mini bar and a refrigerator. Each has a bathroom that provides a rain shower and an oversized bathtub. Chanalai Hillside Resort Karon Beach Phuket's restaurant is open for lunch and dinner, offering guests a pleasant dining experience near their room. Alternatively, there are a range of eateries within a 10-minute stroll. Chanalai Hillside Resort Karon Beach Phuket is just steps from Karon Beach and a short car trip from Kata Beach and Patong Beach. The friendly staff at the tour desk are available to book and organise activities in Karon.Revato

name: Tp Guesthouse Phuket
address: 98/1 Soi Surin, Talat Yai, Mueang, Phuket City 83000
description: No description found

name: Patong Mansion - Sha Certified
description: Patong Mansion - SHA Certified is an 5-minute drive from Patong Beach. It offers air-conditioned rooms with a private balcony and free Wi-Fi. The property features a 24-hour front desk and pool. Free public parking is possible on site. Rooms are fitted with a flat-screen cable TV, minibar and electric kettle. They also come with a safety deposit box and wardrobe. En suite bathrooms are equipped with shower facilities. Buffet breakfast can be enjoyed every morning at the property. Local dining outlets can be found within a 5-minute walk. Motorbike rental can be arranged at an additional charge. The property is a 5-minute drive to Patong Boxing Stadium, Bangla Street and Jungceylon Shopping Centre. Phuket Town is a 25-minute drive away while Phuket International Airport is a 50-minute drive.

name: Grand Mercure Phuket Patong (Sha Plus+)
description: Set back 500 metres from Patong Beach, Grand Mercure Phuket Patong Resort & Villas offers a quiet and secluded sanctuary just steps away from one of the most famous beachfront entertainment districts in Thailand. Shopping bazaars, a range of international eateries and many of Phuket's most exciting nightlife venues are all within walking distance. Excursions to outlying islands and incredible diving and snorkelling sites are easily arranged from Patong.accorhotels.com

name: Andaman Place
address: 67 moo7 Thepkrasatree rd. Thepkrasatree, Thalang District, Phuket, Phuket City 83110
description: Situated in Thalang, 1.3 km from Wat Prathong, Andaman Place features air-conditioned accommodation and a terrace. This 3-star hotel offers room service. Blue Canyon Country Club is 10 km away and Splash Jungle Water Park is 15 km from the hotel. All rooms in the hotel are fitted with a flat-screen TV. Khao Phra Thaeo National Park is 4.8 km from Andaman Place, while Two Heroines Monument is 7.9 km from the property. The nearest airport is Phuket International Airport, 11 km from the accommodation.

name: Novotel Phuket Vintage Park Resort
address: 89 Rat U Thit 200 Pee Rd, Patong 83150
description: Novotel Phuket Vintage Park is a 4-star resort featuring contemporary South East Asian architecture and modern facilities. Only a few steps away from shopping centers and Patong's vibrant nightlife, the hotel boasts an all-day dining restaurant, a swim-up bar, a lobby bar, a ballroom dividable into three meeting rooms, a 2,000 m² swimming pool, complimentary WIFI, fitness, and large outdoor car park.accorhotels.com

name: The Mooring Resort
description: Set in Panwa Beach, 400 metres from Ao Yon Beach, The Mooring Resort offers accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a garden and a terrace. This 4-star resort offers a range of water sports facilities, a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi. Some units at the property feature a balcony with a sea view. The resort will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a kettle, a fridge, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At The Mooring Resort all rooms include bed linen and towels. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a continental breakfast. Bike hire and car hire are available at The Mooring Resort and the area is popular for snorkelling and canoeing. Panwa Beach is 2.1 km from the resort, while Phuket Aquarium is 2.1 km from the property. The nearest airport is Phuket International, 41 km from The Mooring Resort, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Meroom
address: 77 Tirok-U-Tid 1 Rd. Tambol Taladyai, Phuket City 83000
description: Meroom is located in the heart of Phuket Town. It is a 2-minute walk from Robinson Shopping Centre and a 15-minute walk from Phuket Old Town. Free WiFi access is available. Each room here provides guests with a flat-screen cable TV, air conditioning and a refrigerator. Select room types also include a seating area. Featuring a shower, the private bathroom comes with a hairdryer and free toiletries. At Meroom, you will find a 24-hour front desk, a tour desk and a daily housekeeping. Laundry services are also available. The hotel is a short walk from local restaurants, food stalls and a local market. Phuket International Airport is a 30-minute drive away.

name: The Malika Hotel (SHA Plus+)
address: 74 Thakua Thung Road, Tambon Talad Yai, Phuket City 83000
description: Set in Phuket Town, 2 km from Thai Hua Museum, The Malika Hotel - SHA Extra Plus offers accommodation with free bikes, free private parking, a garden and a shared lounge. The property is located 2.1 km from Chinpracha House, 6.6 km from Prince of Songkla University and 9.2 km from Chalong Temple. The hotel provides a terrace, a 24-hour front desk, and free WiFi is available throughout the property. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a kettle, a fridge, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a balcony and a private bathroom with a shower. The Malika Hotel - SHA Extra Plus features some units with city views, and every room is equipped with a patio. At the accommodation the rooms are equipped with bed linen and towels. Chalong Pier is 10 km from The Malika Hotel - SHA Extra Plus, while Phuket Aquarium is 11 km from the property. The nearest airport is Phuket International Airport, 32 km from the hotel.

name: Glam Habitat
description: Offering a year-round outdoor pool, barbecue and sun terrace, Glam Habitat - SHA Extra Plus is located in Kamala Beach, 300 metres from Phuket FantaSea. Free WiFi is featured and free private parking is available on site. Each non-smoking room includes a flat-screen TV. You will find a kettle in the room. For your comfort, you will find bathrobes and slippers. There is a 24-hour front desk at the property. The hotel also offers car hire. Kamala Police Station is 200 metres from Glam Habitat - SHA Extra Plus, while Big C Market Kamala is 1 km from the property. The nearest airport is Phuket International Airport, 17 km from the property.

name: Destination Resort Phuket Surin Beach
address: 106 / 27 Moo3, Cherngtalay, Talang, Phuket, Choeng Thale 83110
description: Directly across from beautiful Surin Beach, Destination Resorts Phuket Surin Beach - SHA Extra Plus offers a complete resort experience with modern air-conditioned rooms and free WiFi. A 20-minute drive from lively Patong beach, the hotel features 3 restaurants and bars and up to 3 outdoor pools with water slides. The rooms and facilities at the resort were renovated in 2018. Each room has a private balcony, DVD player, a refrigerator and an electric kettle. A spacious en suite bathroom comes with free toiletries and a hairdryer. Siam Adventure Club provides entertainment and modern amenities to enjoy a variety of activities, such as island, boat and safari tours. Feel welcome with the squad of rangers and Elfie the Elephant welcoming you from your first steps into the resort. During your stay, take advantage of the Kid’s world, the modern Arcade Game’s room, the Ice Cream shop, or buy some souvenirs from the Toy store. If you feel adventurous, the Siam adventure Club Tour desk offers a large range of activities and excursions outside the resort. When the sun sets, you can also enjoy the state-of-the-art cinema rooms and watch new release movies. Guests can head to the spa for a relaxing massage or exercise at the modern fitness centre with scheduled classes. Staff at the 24-hour front desk can assist guests with car rental and currency exchange. Buffet breakfast is served at Asia Alive, which also offers an international all-day menu. Refreshment can be enjoyed at Joe's Kool. Champions Bar & Grill offers hearty favourites and regular sports events. Novotel Phuket Surin is located 2 km away from Phuket FantaSea and 10 km from Jungceylon Mall in Patong. The famous nightlife and entertain area can also be reached within a short drive. It is a 25-minute drive from Phuket International Airport.

name: Snoozy
description: Located in Phuket (Talat Yai), Snoozy is within a 10-minute walk of Phuket Sunday Night Market and Phuket Trickeye Museum. This hotel is 1.7 mi (2.7 km) from Bangkok Hospital Phuket and 4.6 mi (7.4 km) from Chalong Bay. Take in the views from a garden and make use of amenities such as complimentary wireless Internet access. Free self parking is available onsite. Make yourself at home in one of the 5 air-conditioned rooms featuring kitchens with full-sized refrigerators/freezers and stovetops. Rooms have private balconies. LCD televisions with cable programming provide entertainment, while complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected. Conveniences include safes and desks.FarePortal

name: Big Buddha Hillside
description: Set in Phuket Town, 2.8 km from Chalong Beach, Big Buddha Hillside Hotel offers accommodation with a garden, free private parking and a terrace. This 3-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi. The property is allergy-free and is situated 2.7 km from Chalong Temple. The units come with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a fridge, a kettle, a shower, free toiletries and a desk. The hotel features certain units that feature pool views, and every room includes a private bathroom and a wardrobe. Chalong Pier is 3.5 km from Big Buddha Hillside Hotel, while Chinpracha House is 10 km away. The nearest airport is Phuket International Airport, 39 km from the accommodation.

name: Hotel Ikon Phuket
description: Situated on a hillside, Hotel IKON Phuket offers spacious rooms with free WiFi and views of Karon Beach and surrounding greenery. It features massages, an outdoor pool and free parking. Hotel IKON Phuket is a 15-minute walk from the white sands of Karon Beach and the shopping and dining options in the neighbourhood. It is a 10-minute drive from Patong Beach and an hour’s drive from Phuket International Airport. World-class golf courses are within a 20-minute drive. Spacious rooms feature a private balcony with ocean or mountain views. They are fitted with air conditioning, cable TV and a safe. A minibar and hairdryer are also provided. The hotel provides car and bicycle rental. A tour desk with ticket service helps with travel arrangements. Airport transfer is also available. IKON Café offers a buffet line of Thai and European dishes, while Ombre Restaurant, which also has an outdoor seating area, serves a la carte Thai and European cuisines.

name: The Tint at Phuket Town Hotel (SHA Plus+)
address: 2/11 Dibuk Rd. T.Talad Yai, Phuket City 83000
description: The Tint At Phuket Town is a 10-minute walk from Phuket Old Town. It features rooms with a private balcony and free Wi-Fi. Other facilities include a 24-hour front desk and a tour desk. The Tint At Phuket Town is 2.8 km from Central Festival Mall, 2.9 km from Rassada Pier and 9 km from Royal Phuket Marina. Phuket International Airport is a 45-minute drive away. On-site parking is possible. Comfortable rooms are equipped with air conditioning, a flat-screen cable TV and a fridge. Shower facilities are in an en suite bathroom. Shops and restaurants can be found next to the property at Limelight Avenue.

name: New Forest Patong
description: Offering accommodation with free WiFi, air conditioning and flat-screen TV, New Forest Patong is set 1.4 km from Patong Beach and 1.8 km from Kalim Beach. There is a fully equipped private bathroom with hot tub and free toiletries. The aparthotel features a garden and sun terrace. Patong Boxing Stadium is 1.5 km from New Forest Patong, while Jungceylon Shopping Center is 2.2 km away. The nearest airport is Phuket International, 34 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Phuket Bang Tao
description: Welcome to Hilton Garden Inn Phuket Bang Tao a contemporary 4-star hotel nestled on Phuket island at the peaceful Bang Tao beach in prime Laguna area. A haven that enjoys what the sun sand and sea have to offer: we are conveniently situated within walking distance of a variety of attractions entertainment spots beaches, and recreational facilities. Set in a central location the hotel is a short 25-minute drive away from Patong as well as the Phuket International Airport.Feel at home while away from home in one of our 177 modern and functionally-designed guest rooms. Featuring a cozy living space to fulfill your desires for comfort sit back on our bay window sofas as you take in the idyllic island sceneries. The hotel also features select rooms fitted with private balconies that overlook the Laguna Phuket accompanied by tranquil mountain views. Rest and recharge with our convenient room service menu offerings in-room amenities and walk-in shower. For remote work professionals take advantage of our spacious work areas built-in USB charging ports and complimentary WiFi throughout the hotel.To complete your stay and adapt to your daily routines, the hotel is equipped with a variety of state-of-the-art-facilities including two outdoor rooftop pools a 24-hour fitness centre a self-service laundromat The Shop: a Grab-and-Go minimart and a secured basement parking lot on-site. For breakfast lunch and dinner make a visit to The Garden Grille restaurant located at the ground floor area for a smorgasbord of international specialties and for everything in-between our rooftop bar is the perfect place to lounge as you relax on the sunbeds with delicious bites and revitalizing refreshments under the sun or better yet with unobstructed views of the sunset.Hilton

name: APK Resort
description: Located amongst popular tourist hot spots, boutiques and eateries, APK Resort is ideal for guests wanting to discover Patong and its surroundings. It provides rooms with complimentary Wi-Fi access and views of the mountains. This modern hotel offers luggage storage, a tour desk and a 24-hour reception. Airport transfers, a wake-up service, a laundry service and a dry cleaning service are available on enquiry. Just minutes from nearby clubs and bars, this 3-star hotel also allows guests to easily explore the best of the local nightlife. The rooms at APK Resort are air-conditioned and offer a private balcony, tea and coffee making facilities and a refrigerator. They come with a desk, a telephone and bottled water. Patong's attractions, including Jungceylon Shopping Center and Soi Bangla, are within a 10-minute walk of APK Resort. It also provides a convenient base to explore Phuket Town and Kathu.Revato

name: Princess Kamala Beachfront Hotel
description: Princess Kamala Beachfront Hotel. is a popular choice amongst travelers in Phuket, whether exploring or just passing through. Both business travelers and tourists can enjoy the property's facilities and services. All the necessary facilities, including free Wi-Fi in all rooms, 24-hour security, daily housekeeping, gift/souvenir shop, postal service, are at hand. Closet, complimentary tea, towels, clothes rack, scale can be found in selected guestrooms. To enhance guests' stay, the property offers recreational facilities such as fitness center, sauna, outdoor pool, massage, children's playground. Discover all Phuket has to offer by making Princess Kamala Beachfront Hotel. your base.Agoda

name: Babylon Pool Villas
description: Babylon Pool Villas Certified offers serviced apartments and studios on the southern tip of Phuket, just behind the calm waters of Nai Harn and Rawai Beach. It features an outdoor saltwater pool, sauna with a spa bath and barbecue facilities. Babylon Pool Villas Certified enjoys a peaceful location, just 5 minutes' drive from Phuket's finest beaches like Rawai, Nai Harn, Ya Nui and Ao Sane. It is a 45-minute drive from Phuket International Airport. Set in a tropical garden, the apartments at Babylon Pool Villas Certified come with outdoor sitting areas. Meals cooked in the fully equipped kitchen can be enjoyed in the dining room or on the private patio. Babylon Pool Villas is an SHA plus certified hotel. This certificate is in recognition of hotels that comply with the highest hygiene, cleanliness and safety standards from the Department of Health and Ministry of Public Health. Guests can relax on the sun loungers by the pool. Babylon Pool Villas Certified also provides free Wi-Fi throughout the property and free private parking. There are coin-operated washing machines on site.

name: Sealord Naithon Beachfront Villa
description: Set in Nai Thon Beach, a few steps from Nai Thon Beach, Sealord Naithon Beachfront Villa offers accommodation with a garden, free private parking, a terrace and a bar. The property is around 2.5 km from Banana Beach, 9.3 km from Blue Canyon Country Club and 12 km from Wat Prathong. The resort has a hot tub, a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi. At the resort all rooms include air conditioning, a desk, a private bathroom, a flat-screen TV, bed linen and a balcony with a sea view. All guest rooms will provide guests with a fridge. Khao Phra Thaeo National Park is 15 km from Sealord Naithon Beachfront Villa, while Splash Jungle Water Park is 16 km from the property. The nearest airport is Phuket International Airport, 8 km from the accommodation.

name: Modern Living Hotel
description: Situated by Patong Beach, Modern Living Hotel boasts an accommodation in the heart of Pa Tong. Guests enjoy seafood dishes at an on-site restaurant. Free WiFi is available throughout the property. Offering ample storage space, the air-conditioned rooms are fitted with a cable TV that comes with international channels. Some rooms provide views of the sea, a spa tub or a pool access. Bathrobes, slippers, a hairdryer and a hot shower are all available in the private bathrooms. The front desk is available 24-hours everyday. Patong Boxing Stadium and Jungceylon Shopping Center are about 1 km away. The nearest airport is Phuket International Airport, 40 km from the property. Airport pick-up services are also available for a surcharge.

name: Armoni Patong Beach Hotel
description: Narry Patong Phuket by iCheck Inn is a popular choice amongst travelers in Phuket, whether exploring or just passing through. The hotel offers a wide range of amenities and perks to ensure you have a great time. Facilities like free Wi-Fi in all rooms, daily housekeeping, kitchen, 24-hour security, taxi service are readily available for you to enjoy. Television LCD/plasma screen, cleaning products, linens, mirror, towels can be found in selected guestrooms. The hotel offers various recreational opportunities. For reliable service and professional staff, Narry Patong Phuket by iCheck Inn caters to your needs.Agoda

name: Capricorn Village - Sha Extra Plus
description: Located in Patong Beach, less than 1 km from Patong Beach, Capricorn Village - SHA Extra Plus provides accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking and a garden. With free WiFi, this 3-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk and a tour desk. Guests can enjoy garden views. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a wardrobe, a kettle, a fridge, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. All units at Capricorn Village - SHA Extra Plus are equipped with a seating area. An à la carte breakfast is available daily at the accommodation. Kalim Beach is 2.1 km from Capricorn Village - SHA Extra Plus, while Jungceylon Shopping Center is 500 metres away. The nearest airport is Phuket International Airport, 36 km from the hotel.

name: Pj Patong Resortel
description: PJ Patong Resortel offers affordable rooms with free Wi-Fi and modern furnishings. Well located a 15-minute walk from lively Patong Beach, it is a 5-minute walk from Jungceylon Shopping Mall. Featuring private balconies overlooking Patong’s streets, air-conditioned rooms at PJ Patong Resortel are fitted with modern dark wood furnishings and cable TV. A fridge and seating area are available. Travel around Phuket easily with the tour and shuttle services provided at the property. Valuables can be deposited in the safe at the 24-hour front desk. The residence is within a 15-minute walk from numerous shopping and eating options surrounding Patong Beach. It is a 45-minute drive from Phuket International Airport.

name: Hotel Indigo Phuket Patong, An IHG Hotel (Sha Plus+)
address: Rat U Thit 200 Pee Rd, Patong 83150
description: Blending contemporary elements with the vibrant colours and cultures of Patong, Hotel Indigo Phuket Patong is a stand-out hotel nestled nearby the beach, shops and entertainment hotspots. Located in North Patong, the hotel features 180 spacious guest rooms designed stylishly to mirror Patong's vibrant scene of tropical forests, bright neon lights and fishing village heritage. The rooms are completed with plush bedding and a spa-inspired bathroom, while you'll be able to stay connected to your loved ones back home with complimentary WiFi. Over at Butcher's Garden, taste a world of flavours at the interactive kitchen where you can choose between locally cured and aged meat or freshly-caught seafood from the Andaman Sea. Don't forget to pick a bottle from our wine shop to complement your meal which is delivered straight to your table by experienced Executive Chef Num and his team. Thirsty? Head over to Pots, Pints and Tikis, the casual street front tiki bar where you can kickback with local craft beers and a cocktail menu, or make it a party with your friends and pour your own drinks with the only Drink Command System in town. The hotel also boasts amazing amenities including a wellness centre, martial arts facilities and a rooftop pool that overlooks a magnificent view of Patong city. So, whether you're looking to rest, relax or immerse yourself in local culture and lifestyle, we promise you a unique stay at Hotel Indigo Phuket Patong.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: My Beach Resort Phuket
address: 105 Aow Yon Road, Moo 8, Panwa Cape, Wichit 83000
description: My Beach Resort Phuket is situated on Phuket, and provides 5-star accommodation as well as a private beach. It offers complimentary Wi-Fi, a sun deck and an outdoor pool. The resort provides a garden to relax in, as well as free public parking on site. Amenities include an around the clock reception, a concierge and meeting rooms. The rooms are air-conditioned and feature soundproofed windows, slippers, a flat-screen TV and a private balcony. They each offer a telephone, a seating area and an in-room safe. Guests staying at My Beach Resort Phuket can sit down to a unique dining experience at the in-house restaurant, conveniently situated for those who want to stay close by when looking to sit down to a meal. In the evening, guests can wind down in the comfortable lounge bar. My Beach Resort Phuket provides an ideal place to explore Kata Beach and Chalong Bay, as well as everything the local area has to offer. Phuket Town and Patong are also a short drive away.Revato

name: SAii Laguna Phuket (SHA Plus+)
description: SAii Laguna Phuket is located on Bangtao Beach. It offers rooms with a private balcony and free Wi-Fi. The resort is an outdoor pool and fitness centre. A kid’s club and babysitting service are available. The property is a 20-minute drive to Patong Beach and Phuket International Airport. It is a 25-minute drive to Phuket Town. For Club, Suite and Villa room types, Club Lounge Access with VIP check-in, gourmet breakfast and afternoon snack, happy hour with beer and wine including chef's tasting menu is included. Rooms feature a flat-screen satellite TV, a minibar and a safety deposit box. It also has a coffee maker and a hairdryer. A bathtub is included in an en suite bathroom. Guests can arrange daytrips at the tour desk while staff at the 24-hour front desk can assist guests with luggage storage and shuttle service. The hotel is equipped with a business centre and meeting facilities.

name: Glow Mira Karon Beach
description: Located in Karon Beach, 300 metres from Karon Beach, GLOW Mira Karon Beach provides accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a shared lounge. With a restaurant, the 4-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The accommodation offers room service, a 24-hour front desk and currency exchange for guests. Guest rooms at the hotel are equipped with a seating area, a flat-screen TV and a safety deposit box. GLOW Mira Karon Beach features certain rooms with city views, and each room has a balcony. At the accommodation each room is equipped with bed linen and towels. The daily breakfast offers continental, American or Asian options. GLOW Mira Karon Beach offers a sun terrace. Phuket Simon Cabaret is 4.6 km from the hotel, while Jungceylon Shopping Center is 6.5 km away. The nearest airport is Phuket International, 41 km from GLOW Mira Karon Beach, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Honey Resort
description: Honey Resort is conveniently located in the popular Kata area. The hotel offers guests a range of services and amenities designed to provide comfort and convenience. Daily housekeeping, taxi service, 24-hour front desk, luggage storage, car park are on the list of things guests can enjoy. Guestrooms are designed to provide an optimal level of comfort with welcoming decor and some offering convenient amenities like television LCD/plasma screen, non smoking rooms, air conditioning, wake-up service, desk. Take a break from a long day and make use of outdoor pool, pool (kids), garden. Friendly staff, great facilities and close proximity to all that Phuket has to offer are three great reasons you should stay at Honey Resort.Agoda

name: The Lake Chalong Hotel (Sha Plus+)
description: Situated in Chalong, 400 metres from Chalong Temple, The Lake Chalong Hotel SHA Plus features accommodation with a garden, free private parking, a shared lounge and a terrace. This 4-star resort offers a restaurant. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi throughout the property. At the resort the rooms have air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a kitchenette, a dining area, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. Every room is equipped with a kettle, while selected rooms also boast a balcony and others also feature city views. All rooms will provide guests with a fridge. An American, Asian or vegetarian breakfast is available each morning at the property. Chalong Pier is 4.8 km from The Lake Chalong Hotel SHA Plus, while Prince of Songkla University is 8 km from the property. The nearest airport is Phuket International Airport, 37 km from the accommodation.

name: The Baycliff Residences
description: Sitting on a cliff that overlooks Patong Bay, The Baycliff Residences offers suites in Phuket. Providing free WiFi, it features a rooftop swimming pool with mountain and sea views. Suites at The Baycliff include a private balcony and a kitchen. Each suite also has a flat-screen TV and a seating area. Bathrooms are fitted with a bathtub and separate room shower. Guests can exercise in the fitness room. Laundry, ironing services are provided. Free parking is available on site. The The Baycliff Residences is a 100 meter by walking to the convenience store,300 meter by walk to street food area to testing with local food, and 10-minute drive to bars and restaurants.

name: The Naka Island, a Luxury Collection Resort & Spa, Phuket (SHA Plus+)
description: Escape to a hidden paradise. The Naka Island, a Luxury Collection Resort & Spa, Phuket is tucked off the east coast of Thailand and offers unsurpassed privacy in the Andaman Sea as the only property on Phuket Island. Journey to our oceanfront beach resort in Phuket by a short speedboat ride and immerse in enchanting coconut groves, beaches and limestone cliffs. Unwind with a cocktail at waterfront Z Bar or the unexpected flavors at our three beachside restaurants. Luxuriate at Spa Naka with a revitalizing massage, facial or wellness service, and stay active with daily hotel happenings, eco-friendly experiences such as planting mangrove trees or fitness center with Technogym® equipment. In your hotel room, suite or villa, discover the same level of refinement and attention to detail. Accommodations are distinct and radiant, boasting scenic views of the garden, sea, beach or terrace. Together with our vacation packages, curate an unforgettable stay at The Naka Island, a Luxury Collection Resort & Spa, Phuket.Marriott

name: Baan Pron Phateep
description: Just a minute’s walk from popular Patong Beach, Baan Pron Phateep offers air-conditioned rooms with chargeable bike rental. Nestled in greenery, it features a peaceful open-air restaurant. Free WiFi is available throughout the property. Featuring classic wood furnishings and a private balcony, the rooms come with a satellite TV, fridge and hot shower. Select units have an electric kettle and microwave oven. Hotel Baan Pron Phateep is a 3-minute walk from the lively shops and nightlife at Bangla Road. Offering free parking, it is an hour’s drive from Phuket International Airport. Phuket can be easily explored with help from the tour desk, which offers ticketing service. Staff at the 24-hour front desk can attend to childcare and laundry needs. Offering daily Western breakfast, the charming restaurant serves a variety of Thai and international dishes. Room service is available.

name: Baan Karonburi Resort (SHA Plus+)
description: A beachfront property on Karon Beach, Baan Karonburi Resort combines Siamese architecture and modern interiors. Some of its rooms enjoy direct access to the outdoor pool. Free WiFi is provided. Baan Karonburi’s spacious rooms feature dark wood furnishings and private balconies. Each air-conditioned room has satellite TV, a safety deposit box, and a fridge with minibar. The bathrooms are fitted with a bathtub and overhead shower. Guests can enjoy a traditional Thai massage, or exercise in the fitness room. The resort also has a children’s pool and a sun deck. For guests’ convenience, it has a 24-hour front desk and a tour desk. Overlooking the Andaman Sea, Lai Thai Restaurant & Bar serves Thai, European and seafood specialities. Drinks, including cocktails, are available. Alternatively, guests can order room service.

name: Baan Suwantawe
description: Baan Suwantawe is a boutique hotel in the heart of Phuket, a 5-minute drive from Old Phuket town with its Sino-Portuguese houses. It has a large outdoor pool and accommodation furnished with teak wood furnishings. The Baan Suwantawe Hotel is situated right next to a public park and a 5-minute drive from the bus station. Its convenient location gives guests easy access to Phuket’s shopping options like Robinson Ocean Phuket. There is a post office a 3-minute walk from the hotel. Studios are charming, featuring wooden flooring, artworks and warm lighting. They are well-equipped with a bathtub in en suite bathrooms, a TV and a fridge. Select rooms have private terraces and a microwave. Guests can enjoy a refreshing dip in the pool or stroll through the hotel’s landscaped grounds. For a quiet afternoon indoors, there is free Wi-Fi available in the lobby.

name: The Blue Hotel - Sha Plus
description: Located in Chalong, 2.7 km from Chalong Temple, The Blue Hotel - SHA Plus provides accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a shared lounge and a terrace. This 3-star hotel offers a bar. The accommodation features a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, luggage storage space and free WiFi. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a kettle, a fridge, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a balcony and a private bathroom with a shower.
