Certain rooms include a kitchen with a microwave. Guest rooms include a wardrobe. A continental, American or Asian breakfast is available daily at the property. Chalong Pier is 4.6 km from The Blue Hotel - SHA Plus, while Chinpracha House is 6.6 km away. The nearest airport is Phuket International Airport, 36 km from the accommodation.

name: Momento Bangtao Beach
address: 69/38 Bangtao Beach, Chengtalay, Talang, Phuket, Choeng Thale 83110
description: Set within a few steps of Bang Tao Beach and 1.4 km of Pineapple Beach in Bang Tao Beach, Momento Bangtao Beach offers accommodation with free WiFi and seating area. Fitted with a terrace, the units offer air conditioning and feature a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with shower and a hair dryer. There is also a kitchenette in some of the units equipped with a microwave. The bed and breakfast offers a continental or American breakfast. Both a bicycle rental service and a car rental service are available at Momento Bangtao Beach. Pansea Beach is 1.7 km from the accommodation, while Two Heroines Monument is 11 km away. The nearest airport is Phuket International, 21 km from Momento Bangtao Beach, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Dwell At Chalong Hill
description: With a stay at Dwell At Chalong Hill in Chalong, you'll be a 3-minute drive from Chalong Temple and 5 minutes from Chalong Pier. This hotel is 2.9 mi (4.7 km) from Chalong Bay and 5.2 mi (8.4 km) from Big Buddha. Enjoy a range of recreational amenities, including an outdoor pool, a sauna, and a fitness center. Featured amenities include dry cleaning/laundry services, a 24-hour front desk, and luggage storage. Free self parking is available onsite. Make yourself at home in one of the 17 air-conditioned rooms featuring refrigerators and flat-screen televisions. Rooms have private balconies. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with showers feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers.FarePortal

name: Mövenpick Resort Bangtao Beach Phuket (Sha Plus+)
description: Here the best of classic Thai and contemporary designs blends in 40 inviting residences. Our bright and breezy accommodation offers living and dining areas, fully-equipped kitchens and over-sized balconies for the ultimate blissful experience. Located a few steps away from Bangtao Beach, this exclusive luxury resort of penthouses and suites treats you to unparalleled relaxation. Experience soothing treatments at Blossom Spa, relax in the pool, or walk along the endless, white Thai sands of Bangtao Beachaccorhotels.com

name: Andaman Beach Suites Hotel
address: 60/12 Rat-Uthit Song Roi Pee Road, Patong 83150
description: Located 150 metres from Patong Beach, Andaman Beach Suites Hotel overlooks the Andaman Sea and features a swimming pool. Some rooms offer views of the sea. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the hotel. Jungceylon Shopping Centre and the vibrant Bangla Road are a 15-minute walk away from Beach Suites Hotel. Phuket International Airport is a 45-minute drive away. Rooms feature classic wooden furnishings and come with a safety deposit box and tea and coffee-making facilities. Attached bathrooms come with shower facilities. Guests can enjoy a session in the sauna. A tennis court and fitness centre are available. There is a children’s playroom for little ones, and an internet corner for guests’ convenience. Suites Restaurant offers a variety of Thai and international cuisines. Drinks are served at The Poolside Snack Corner and at Lobby Bar.

name: Karon Princess Hotel (SHA Plus+)
description: Karon Princess Hotel is located along Karon Bay, just a stroll from the Andaman Sea’s white sandy beach. It features an outdoor pool with a spa tub, and rooms with private balconies. The hotel is a 10-minute drive from Patong Beach and a 20-minute drive from downtown Phuket. It is a scenic 45-minute drive from Phuket International Airport. Air-conditioned rooms at Karon Princess are spacious and offer plenty of natural light. They come with satellite TV, a fridge, and tea/coffee making facilities. A safety deposit box and a hairdryer are also provided. Karon Princess Hotel provides tour information and motorbike rental. Laptops, scanners and printers are available for rent. Offering beachfront dining, The Sunset Restaurant serves Asian and Western dishes. Cocktails are also available for a sip while watching the sun set over Karon Bay. Room service is available.

name: Sivana Place Phuket
address: 53 Moo 4, Soi Pasak 8, Thalang, Phuket City 83110
description: Sivana Place is located in Thalang and features free Wi-Fi. It offers 3-star accommodation with air-conditioned rooms. Guests can enjoy relaxing or working out in the hotel's outdoor pool and gym. There is also free private parking on site for guests travelling with a car. The rooms include a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom and a desk. Guests staying at Sivana Place can sit down to a unique dining experience at the on-site restaurant, conveniently situated for those who want to stay close when looking for a bite to eat. Phuket International Airport is less than a 20-minute drive from the hotel. It also is a convenient base to discover Cherngtalay and Patong.Revato

name: Holiday Inn Express Phuket Patong Beach Central, An IHG Hotel (Sha Plus+)
description: A smart hotel located in the heart of Patong Beach, for savvy travelers looking for a relaxing island getaway experience with Express self-service concept. Only 2 minutes' walk from our hotel to Patong Beach, one of the most beautiful beaches on Phuket Island, and a short distance to various popular places such as Bangla Road, Jungceylon Shopping Mall and Patong Promenade. The hotel offers quick access to all of Phuket's major shopping, dining and entertainment venues. Only 15 minutes' drive from our hotel to the historic Old Phuket Town. Featuring 221 stylishly designed modern rooms, this hotel is the smart choice for savvy leisure travelers who are looking for the best location with the best value in a resort-style hotel on their island getaway. Start your morning with our free Express Start® Breakfast or Grab and Go option and stay connected with our free Wi-Fi throughout the hotel. Relax in our spacious outdoor swimming pools or open space lounge. Get the most out of your stay with our 24-hour Fitness Center, and self-service laundry facility.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Dinso Resort & Villas Phuket, Vignette Collection, an IHG Hotel
description: A 10-min ride from Phuket Patong Beach, reconnect your senses and rediscover the delights of barefoot luxury travel. Be reinvigorated by the perfect balance of subdued, austere beauty and rustic charm. Dinso Resort & Villas is your place to escape and discover Phuket at your own pace. From local breakfast to indulgent wellness experiences, lose yourself to everything Thailand has to offer. Simplicity, tranquillity and naturalness, experience Dinso Resort & Villas, tucked away in nature and inspired by the Wabi-Sabi philosophy.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Pumeria Resort Phuket
description: Pumeria Resort Phuket - SHA Plus features free bikes, outdoor swimming pool, a fitness centre and garden in Bang Tao Beach. Each accommodation at the 3-star resort has mountain views, and guests can enjoy access to a shared lounge and to a terrace. The resort has a hot tub, room service and free WiFi throughout the property. At the resort each room has air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. At Pumeria Resort Phuket - SHA Plus each room comes with bed linen and towels. The accommodation offers an American or halal breakfast. The area is popular for cycling, and car hire is available at Pumeria Resort Phuket - SHA Plus. Bang Tao Beach is 1.8 km from the resort, while Two Heroines Monument is 9 km away. The nearest airport is Phuket International, 19 km from Pumeria Resort Phuket - SHA Plus, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Allamanda Laguna Phuket
description: Located on Phuket's Bang Tao Beach, Allamanda Laguna Phuket - offers spacious accommodation, easy access to a golf course and friendly service. Allamanda Laguna Phuket - is just a 20-minute drive from the airport, Phuket Town and Patong Beach. The hotel offers a free shuttle bus to Laguna Phuket Golf Club. Suites feature an Asian contemporary design. They are fitted with a separate living room and a fully equipped kitchenette. Allamanda Laguna Phuket - has a swimming pool and offers kayaking, paddle boats, as well as other leisure activities.

name: The Chava Resort
description: The Chava Resort is a 2-minute walk from Phuket’s Surin Beach. It offers 5-star service apartments with full kitchen facilities, a dining area and free WiFi. An outdoor pool and restaurant are available. The resort is a 30-minute drive from Phuket International Airport. Surin Plaza Shopping Mall is a short walk away. Convenience stores can be found within a 2-minute walk. The spacious apartments at The Chava Resort feature modern décor and private balconies. The lounge area is equipped with a flat-screen TV, DVD player and a iPod dock. Bathtubs are included in the private bathroom. Guests can lounge by the 35-metre swimming pool or book a day trip at the tour desk. Chava also provides laundry services and currency exchange. The Chava Bar & Restaurant overlooks the pool and serves authentic Thai dishes, Western delights and refreshing cocktails. Reservations at nearby restaurants can also be arranged at the front desk from 06.00-23.00 hours.

name: Tiger Complex By Eyg
address: 155/16-19 Phang Muang Sai Kor Road, Patong 83150
description: Set in Patong Beach, Tiger Complex By EYG offers 3-star accommodation with a restaurant and a bar. The property is situated 1.8 km from Patong Boxing Stadium, 10 km from Prince of Songkla University and 14 km from Chinpracha House. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a wardrobe, a kettle, a fridge, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At Tiger Complex By EYG all rooms come with bed linen and towels. An American breakfast is available every morning at the accommodation. Popular points of interest near Tiger Complex By EYG include Patong Beach, Jungceylon Shopping Center and Phuket Simon Cabaret. The nearest airport is Phuket International Airport, 35 km from the hotel.

name: Ps Hill Resort - Sha Plus
description: P.S.Hill Resort offers tranquil stays in spacious accommodation, a 5-minute drive from Patong Beach. Enjoying views of Patong Mountain, the hotel also features a swimming pool, free Wi-Fi and free shuttle services to the beach and city. The resort is a 10-minute drive from Karon Beach, while Phuket International Airport is a 45-minute drive away. The popular Bangla Road is situated within 2 km of the resort. Designed to offer much natural lighting, rooms also have ample seating area, ideal for lounging. They have private balconies and are equipped with a fridge and cable TV. The resort also offers the convenience of a tour desk. It provides car and motorcycle rental facilities.

name: Mangosteen Ayurveda & Wellness Resort (SHA Plus+)
description: Overlooking the Andaman Sea, Mangosteen Ayurveda & Wellness Resort - SHA Plus offers relaxing stays set on a peaceful hillside. It boasts a 680m² outdoor pool with a jetted pool, spa and free shuttles to Nai Harn Beach. Mangosteen Ayurveda & Wellness Resort - SHA Plus is a 15-minute drive from Kata Beach and a 50-minute drive from Phuket International Airport. Surrounded by tropical greenery, spacious villa-style rooms feature a private balcony and outdoor rain showers. They have free WiFi and a sofa at the seating area. Guests can get a good workout at the well-equipped gym or enjoy relaxing massages at Ayurveda Destination Spa. Other facilities include a tour desk, gift shop and library. Boasting stunning sea views, the property's restaurant serves Thai Mediterranean specialities in a casual setting. There is also a wine cellar.

name: Hotel de Karon
description: Hotel de Karon is located along Patak Road in Phuket, a 5-minute walk to Karon Beach. The hotel offers modern accommodation with free Wi-Fi and free parking. The air-conditioned rooms come with a satellite TV, fridge and a minibar. En suite bathrooms come with hot/cold shower facilities. Hotel de Karon provides Thai massage services and a tour desk. Other facilities include laundry services and car rentals. The hotel’s restaurant serves Thai and international cuisines. Fresh coffee and homemade bread are available at Bakery Corner. Hotel de Karon is a 40-minute drive from Phuket International Airport.

name: Quip Bed & Breakfast
description: Quip Bed & Breakfast features comfortable rooms with air conditioning and en suite bathrooms. It is 500 metres from Robinson Department Store. Free WiFi is available throughout the residence. The beautiful historic Sino-Portuguese building in Phuket Old Town and Thai Hua Museum are just 200 metres from Quip Bed & Breakfast. It is a 20-minute drive from Phuket Bus Terminal and a 45-minute drive from Phuket International Airport. Central Festival is 1 km away. All rooms are equipped with a flat-screen satellite TV, in-room safety box and a refrigerator. Hot and cold shower facilities are in the en suite bathrooms. For convenience, the residence offers a 24-hour front desk and a laundry service. Staff at the on-site tour desk can assist with sightseeing and travel arrangements. Guests can enjoy a variety of Thai and international dishes, as well as light snacks served at the on-site restaurant from 08:00-24:00 hrs. Local restaurants and seafood can also be found within a 15-minute walk from the property.

name: Sunset Beach Resort
description: Featuring a spa with massage services and an outdoor spa pool, Sunset Beach Resort - SHA Extra Plus Certified provides a quiet getaway along Patong Beach. The resort offers 1 restaurant and 3 bars. Resort Sunset Beach provides a free shuttle service to Patong Town, 2.5 km away. Phuket International Airport is a 45-minute drive away. Spacious rooms at Sunset Resort offer balconies with outdoor seating areas. A TV with cable channels and tea/coffee makers are provided. Guests can work out in the well-equipped fitness centre. Sightseeing arrangements and car rental services are available at the tour desk while a business centre takes care of guests’ communication needs. Sea & Sun Restaurant offers traditional Thai and European cuisine. The restaurant also serves an American buffet breakfast daily. The Rock Bar serves light snacks and beverages and offers views of the pool. Guests can also enjoy the drinks at the pool bar.

name: Travelodge Phuket Town
description: Situated in Kathu, Travelodge Phuket Town provides 4-star accommodation, as well as a swimming pool. Those staying at the property also have access to complimentary wireless internet and on-site parking. There are a range of amenities on offer to guests of the hotel, such as a 24-hour reception, luggage storage and a sun deck. In sunny weather, an outdoor terrace offers a nice spot to relax. The rooms are air conditioned and include a flat-screen TV, tea and coffee making facilities and a seating area. They each offer a laptop safe, an in-room safe and a desk. Guests staying at Travelodge Phuket Town can sit down to a unique dining experience at the on-site restaurant, ideally based for those who want to stay close by when looking for a bite to eat. The hotel is close to Central Festival Phuket. It also is a convenient base to discover nearby Phuket Town and Patong.Revato

name: Karon Phunaka Resort
description: Occupying a prime location on Naka Mountain, Karon Phunaka Resort offers panoramic ocean and forest views. Wi-Fi, parking and shuttle service to Karon Beach are provided for free. Enjoy stunning views of the ocean from the comfort of private balconies. Pleasantly furnished with warm colours, each room comes with a flat-screen cable TV, a fridge and safe. Karon Phunaka’s outdoor infinity pool provides an ideal place for relaxation. Regular workouts can be maintained at the fitness centre and squash courts. Cool sea breezes accompany Thai specialities at Resort Karon Phunaka’s open air restaurant. Meals can also be served in rooms. Karon Phunaka Resort is a 10-minute drive from the nightlife on Patong Beach. Karon Beach is a 15-minute walk away. It is a 50-minute drive from Phuket International Airport.

name: Mida Grande Resort Phuket
address: 179/450 Had Surin Soi 4, Moo 3, Phuket City 83110
description: Set in Surin Beach, 1.4 km from Surin Beach, Mida Grande Resort Phuket SHA Plus offers accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a garden. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, a kids' club and a shared lounge, along with free WiFi. The hotel features a terrace and a 24-hour front desk. At the hotel every room has air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a bidet, free toiletries and a hairdryer. At Mida Grande Resort Phuket SHA Plus rooms include bed linen and towels. Breakfast is available every morning, and includes American, Asian and halal options. Pansea Beach is 1.8 km from the accommodation, while Bang Tao Beach is 1.9 km away. The nearest airport is Phuket International Airport, 21 km from Mida Grande Resort Phuket SHA Plus.

name: Baan Boa Resort
description: Located 3 metres from Patong Beach, Baan Boa is features a restaurant and an outdoor spa pool. Rooms offer a private balcony with seating area. Wi-Fi access is available. Just a 10-minute walk from Patong Shopping Mall, Baan Boa Resort is a 45-minute drive from Phuket International Airport. Rooms at the resort feature tiled flooring and a blend of modern and traditional Lanna Thai furnishings. Each air-conditioned room is equipped with cable TV and minibar. Some rooms offer pool or sea views. Room service is provided. Guests may relax by Baan Boa Resort’s sundeck or make travel arrangements at the tour desk. Parking is provided for free.

name: Thanthip Beach Resort
description: Only 200 metres from popular Patong Beach, Thanthip Beach Resort -SHA Plus provides well-appointed non-smoking rooms with flat-screen TVs and en suite bathrooms. It boasts a large outdoor pool and a restaurant. Guests enjoy free 1-hour of Wi-Fi access on the arrival date. Conveniently located, The Thanthip Resort is a stroll form several dining and entertainment options. The resort is a 50-minute drive from Phuket International Airport. Rooms offer spacious interiors and are fitted with amenities like a minibar, in-room safe and a coffee/tea maker. Private bathrooms are provided with a hairdryer. Thanthip Garden Restaurant serves traditional Thai, as well as, international favourites. Fresh seafood dishes can also be sampled daily. The Sea Breeze Bar serves a wide variety of refreshing beverages.

name: Villa Zolitude Resort & Spa (Sha Plus+)
address: 53/25 Moo5 Soi Bann Nai Trok, Chalong 83130
description: A peaceful retreat in Phuket, Villa Zolitude Resort & Spa is tucked within a hillside rainforest overlooking Chalong Beach. It offers luxurious villa living and features an outdoor infinity pool. Villa Zolitude Resort & Spa is a 40-minute drive from Phuket International Airport. Wat Chalong Temple is just around 200 metres from the resort. Featuring a private pool with a spacious sun deck, each villa at Zolitude has a living room and pantry. Amenities include a flat-screen TV, a free minibar and free Wi-Fi. The bathrooms come with a bathtub and an outdoor shower. Guests can visit Zense Spa for massages or facial and body treatments. The library offers a collection of DVDs, CDs, reading material and board games. Drinks and snacks are served at the Coffee Corner. The restaurant features an international, Thai and seafood menu, along with live music.

name: Rak Elegant Hotel Patong
description: Set in Patong Beach, 1.4 km from Patong Beach, Rak Elegant Hotel Patong - SHA Extra Plus offers accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a garden. Offering a restaurant, the property also has a shared lounge, as well as a sauna and a hot tub. The accommodation features a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a kettle, a fridge, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a bidet. Some rooms also offer a kitchenette with a microwave and a stovetop. At Rak Elegant Hotel Patong - SHA Extra Plus all rooms are fitted with bed linen and towels. The daily breakfast offers continental, American or Asian options. The accommodation offers a terrace. Kalim Beach is 2.8 km from Rak Elegant Hotel Patong - SHA Extra Plus, while Patong Boxing Stadium is 600 metres from the property. The nearest airport is Phuket International Airport, 35 km from the hotel.

name: The Melody Phuket
description: The Melody Phuket located in Kata Beach and short drive from both Kata and Karon Beaches. Location in a very convenient: Makro store, 7/11, supper market, fresh market, bars (for cheap price). Walk to the beach is 15 minute but we have free shuttle service to Kata and Karon Beach. The Indy Deluxe Room and Jazz Pool Access Rooms come with air conditioning, bright rooms with balcony, a flat-screen cable TV and sofa bed for chilling. Room amenities with safety box, free water, free Wi-Fi, hairdryer, shampoo and soap, toiletries etc. Nice and big swimming pool, gym and the Moni café (hotel restaurant) for amazing food and coffee. The Melody Phuket has a free parking and 24-hours reception (friendly and helpful). The hotel is 20-minute drive to Patong beach and Phuket International Airport is 31 km away. Your credit card submit is for confirm reservation. Payment will be made only upon arrival.

name: Intercontinental Phuket Resort, An IHG Hotel
address: Moo 3, Kamala Sub-district,Kamala Beach, Phuket City 83150
description: Nestled on the powder-soft sands of Kamala Beach, InterContinental® Phuket Resort is a sleek, sophisticated, and elegant beachside hideaway. The resort is cocooned by jungle-covered hills at one end and offers heavenly views of the Andaman Sea on the other. Enjoy a global culinary adventure at one of our seven themed dining outlets, relax by one of our five stunning swimming pools, welcome bliss at our Sati spa, or just spend the day on a private sunbed listening to the sound of the waves.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: The Little Mermaid Guesthouse & Restaurant
description: The Little Mermaid Guesthouse Restaurant is set in Kata center, just a 5 minute walk to beautiful Kata beach. Guests can enjoy food and drinks at the on-site bar and restaurant. Additional restaurants, shops and nightlife are within walking distance of this property. Free WiFi access is available in rooms and in all public areas. Rooms here provide guests with cable TV, air conditioning and a refrigerator. There is also a safety deposit box and a desk. Featuring a shower, the en suite bathroom comes with a hair dryer and free toiletries. At Little Mermaid Guesthouse, you will find a 24-hour front desk, a tour desk and luggage storage. A 10-minute walk from Karon Beach, the inn is 100 metres from Dino Park Mini Golf and 2.4 km from Kata Noi Beach. Phuket International Airport is 45 km away.

name: The Thames Pool Access Resort & Villa - Sha Extra Plus
address: 77 Moo 8, Chaofa West Road, T. Chalong, Chalong 83130
description: The Thames Pool Access Resort & Villa - SHA Extra Plus features an outdoor swimming pool, fitness centre, a garden and terrace in Chalong. The property is around 2.4 km from Chalong Beach, 2.2 km from Chalong Temple and 2 km from Chalong Pier. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a coffee machine, a fridge, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. All rooms are equipped with a kettle, while selected rooms here will provide you with a kitchen with an oven, a microwave and a stovetop. The units feature a wardrobe. At The Thames Pool Access Resort & Villa - SHA Extra Plus guests are welcome to take advantage of a hot tub. You can play table tennis and darts at this 4-star hotel, and bike hire and car hire are available. Chinpracha House is 9.1 km from the accommodation, while Thai Hua Museum is 9.4 km away. The nearest airport is Phuket International Airport, 39 km from The Thames Pool Access Resort & Villa - SHA Extra Plus.

name: The Little Moon Residence
description: The Little Moon Residence offers rooms with a private balcony, a 5-minute drive from Patong Beach. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the residence. Jungceylon Shopping Mall and Bangla Road are a 5-minute drive from The Little Moon Residence, while Kata and Karon beaches are a 10-minute ride away. It takes 30 minutes by car to Phuket Town and 45 minutes to Phuket International Airport. All rooms are equipped with air conditioning, a cable TV and a refrigerator. En suite bathrooms are fitted with shower facilities. A 24-hour front desk attends to guests’ needs throughout the day. Free on-site parking for motorbikes is available. A hot breakfast comes with a selection of dishes and espresso, while drinks can be enjoyed in the lobby bar.

name: Wyndham Sea Pearl Resort Phuket (SHA Plus+)
description: Located on the southwest coast of Thailand nestled between the lush jungle and clear blue waters of the Andaman Sea, Wyndham Sea Pearl Resort Phuket is waiting for you. From secluded coves to busy shores - your paradise is just around the corner with more than 30 of the world's finest beaches to choose from! If outdoor adventure is calling, take a guided day tour and canoe through Phuket's secret lagoons and caves to see the limestone cliffs jutting vertically through the water. Defy gravity by ziplining through the jungle at nearby Flying Hanuman or hike half-way up the Kathu Waterfall to the drop pool and jump in for a swim! This resort offers a variety of rooms including hotel deluxe, one- and two-bedroom deluxe suites - both with and without pool access, private pool suites and carissa pool villa suites that comfortably sleep 2 to 4 guests. All suites feature a private balcony/terrace, coffee/tea maker and mini fridge, and most suites offer access to an outdoor spa tub. Choose a one-or two-bedroom suite or carissa pool villa for private bedrooms and separate living/dining areas with a sleeper sofa. Upgrade to a one- or two-bedroom deluxe with pool access for direct access to a shared pool and spa tub or choose the one-bedroom deluxe with pool or carissa pool villa for a private, infinity pool and kitchenette. Rollaway beds are available for an additional fee. Just five minutes from the resort is Patong Beach - a popular place to visit on the island and known for its exotic views, beachside activities, premier shopping and energetic nightlife. Just off the beach, Bangla Road is the liveliest place to explore with local eateries, bars, night clubs, live music, vendors and premier shopping. Remember to drink plenty of water and keep the local phrase 'mai pen rai' in mind, meaning "it doesn't matter" because while in Phuket, there is simply no room for worry.iHotelier/iStay

name: The elements Boutique House
description: No description found

name: Ginis Beach Resort
description: Ginis Beach Resort has a garden, terrace, a restaurant and bar in Kamala Beach. This 3-star hotel offers room service. The property is non-smoking and is set 100 metres from Kamala Beach. At the hotel, all rooms come with a balcony. At Ginis Beach Resort, all rooms have air conditioning and a flat-screen TV. An Asian breakfast is available every morning at the accommodation. Laem Sing Beach is 1.6 km from Ginis Beach Resort, while Patong Boxing Stadium is 11 km from the property. The nearest airport is Phuket International Airport, 25 km from the hotel.

name: iCheck inn Chill Patong
description: This modern hotel in Patong offers complimentary Wi-Fi, as well as laundry facilities and a 24-hour reception. It provides 3-star accommodation with air-conditioned rooms. Each room is well-equipped to make guests comfortable and offers an in-room safe, a flat-screen TV and an alarm clock. Private bathrooms come with either a bath or a shower. Studio Patong by iCheck inn houses both a restaurant and a bar where guests are able to unwind of an evening. Alternatively, the local neighbourhood offers several bars and restaurants with a choice of varied cuisines. Studio Patong by iCheck inn provides a convenient place to explore Karon Beach, as well as everything the local area has to offer. It is also a short car ride from Phuket Town and Kathu.Revato

name: La Moon At Phuket - Sha Extra Plus
address: 2/6 Luangphor Road, Taladyai, Muang, Phuket City 83000
description: La Moon At Phuket - SHA Extra Plus is a 10-minute drive from Phuket Town and Robinson Department Store. It offers modern air-conditioned rooms with balconies and free Wi-Fi. The hotel is equipped with karaoke facilities, tour desk and meeting rooms. The property is a 15-minute drive to Rassada Pier. It is a 45-minute drive from Phuket International Airport. Non-smoking rooms at La Moon At Phuket - SHA Extra Plus are fitted with a cable TV, a minibar and wardrobe. A bathtub and free toiletries are included in an en suite bathroom. Staff at the 24-hour front desk can assist guests with shuttle and car rental services. Luggage storage and safety deposit boxes are also available. Free private parking is possible on site. Guests can enjoy Thai and international dishes at the restaurant from 06:00-24:00. Room service can be arranged upon request.

name: Best Western Phuket Ocean Resort (SHA Plus+)
description: For rooms overlooking the gardens or ocean views in Karon Beach, Best Western Phuket Ocean Resort provides stylish and affordable accommodation nestled on a hillside, within easy walking distance of the white sands of Karon Beach. As one of the best value vacation resorts in Phuket, there is no better choice than Best Western Phuket Ocean Resort. Perfectly positioned between the azure waters of the Andaman Sea, Karon Village shopping center and the many other attractions of the Karon Beach area, this hotel with bright and spacious design is the best choice for a fabulous Phuket getaway. The hotel’s positioning offers easy access to family-friendly activities as well as a collection of wellness and beauty services in addition to the nearby golf course, making it a place that has something for everyone. The on-site restaurant with Karon Beach views serves a delightful combination of Thai and European dishes in a picturesque setting making for the perfect end to a day of enjoying all that Phuket has to offer. There is both a lobby bar and a pool bar serving drinks all day long so if you choose to relax in one of the best hotels in Karon Beach you will have everything you need for the perfect day. Best Western Phuket Ocean Resort in Karon Beach is the best area to stay in Phuket for couples and families alike with stylish and affordable guest rooms with balconies. The modern décor and contemporary amenities create a space where guests can truly relax and soak up the ambiance of this delightful destination. The property features 3 outdoor swimming pools for guests to enjoy along with a car rental desk to make experiencing the most of the surrounding area a breeze. Choose Best Western Phuket Ocean Resort, for stylish and affordable accommodation in Karon Beach where one can immerse themselves in the best of what the island of Phuket has to offer.bestwestern.com

name: Baan Sailom Resort
description: Located along Karon Beach, Baan Sailom Hotel features comfortable rooms with a private balcony and an outdoor pool. Free Wi-Fi is available in all areas Baan Sailom Hotel is 1 km away from Karon Night Market and 1.6 km from Wat Suwan Khiri Khet. Phuket International Airport is 30 km away. Each well-designed room has air conditioning, a flat-screen cable TV and a seating area. Additional amenities include a fridge and a safety box. Featuring shower facilities, an en suite bathroom also comes with free toiletries. The hotel has a tour desk to assist with sightseeing arrangements. A laundry and a shuttle service can be arranged at an additional cost. A range of local restaurants are within a short walking distance of the property.

name: The Cove
description: Located along Ao Yon Bay, near Cape Panwa, The Cove offers comfortable accommodation with sea views. Free WiFi is available. Bungalows and villas feature air conditioning, a flat-screen TV and a full minibar. There is also a safety deposit box, a seating area and a private bathroom with a shower. The Cove serves a healthy breakfast, along with Mediterranean and Australians cuisines. Cocktails and others drinks are also available. Phuket Town is a 15-minute drive from the property, while Central Festival Phuket is a 20-minute drive away. Phuket International Airport is located a 40 km drive from The Cove.

name: Samkong Place
address: 369/142 Yaowarat Road Tambon Taladyai, Phuket City 83000
description: Located along Phuket's Yaowarat Road, Samkong Place offers modern air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi. Housed in a colonial-style white building, it is a 5-minute drive from Tesco Lotus. Decorated in soothing shades of blue and yellow, all rooms feature a private balcony and flat-screen TV. A fridge, minibar and personal safe are also included. En suite tiled bathrooms have hot shower facilities. Samkong Place is situated just opposite Siam City Bank, and is a 10-minute drive from Central Festival Phuket Shopping Mall. Phuket International Airport is a 35-minute drive from the hotel. Guests can rent a motorbike or car from the front desk to explore Phuket at leisure. The hotel also provides laundry services and a computer corner at the lobby. A Continental breakfast spread is available every morning at the hotel's dining room.

name: Thavorn Beach Village Resort & Spa Phuket (SHA Plus+)
description: Featuring a private beach, a sauna and a swimming pool, Thavorn Beach Village Resort & Spa Phuket SHA Plus+ is located in Kamala and provides comfortable accommodation. Guests also have exclusive access to the Chann Wellness Spa and Lagoon Swimming Pool. There are a variety of facilities at the resort, including complimentary wireless internet and free private parking on site. It offers family-friendly amenities, with room designs and services for families of any size, as well as a kids club and a kids pool. It also features a sun deck with impressive pool, sea and garden views. Offering 5-star accommodation, the rooms at Thavorn Beach Village Resort & Spa Phuket SHA Plus+ feature a private balcony. They are air conditioned and offer a mini bar, slippers and a refrigerator. To start the day, guests are invited to have breakfast at Thavorn Beach Village Resort & Spa Phuket SHA Plus+'s on-site restaurants, then later experience international, Thai and Chinese meals at Marisa Terrace or international cuisine at Thai Sala Cafe. The resort is a convenient place to discover nearby Patong Beach and Kamala Beach. Patong and Phuket Town are located a short drive away.Revato

name: Royal Phuket City Hotel (SHA Plus+)
description: Set right at the heart of Phuket’s lively capital, Royal Phuket City Hotel - SHA Plus offers spacious air-conditioned rooms with a private bathroom. outdoor pool and 2 restaurants. Classically furnished with colorful Thai touches, rooms at the Hotel Royal Phuket City include a satellite TV and personal safe. Guests can relax in the seating area. Guests can sneak in a workout at the fitness center. Authentic Chinese cuisine is offered at Yan Long Restaurant. Hok Nguan Kung Shrine is a 7-minute walk away, and Wat Chalong Temple is a 15-minute drive. Phuket International Airport is a 45-minute drive away.

name: Austrian Garden Hotel Patong
description: Located a 2-minute walk to Patong Beach, Austrian Garden Hotel Patong offers free Wi-Fi throughout the property. Boasting an outdoor pool, the residence provides free parking at a location nearby. The hotel is a 7-minute walk to Bangla Road, Jungceylon shopping centre and Bangla Boxing Stadium. Kamala Beach and Kata Beach are a 15-minute ride away. Phuket International Airport can be reached within a 45-minute drive from the hotel. Each air-conditioned room is equipped with cable TV, safe, minibar and en suite bathroom with shower facilities. Room service is available from 7:00 until 23:00 hrs. Guests can take a stroll in the garden. Austrian Garden serves a wide range of Thai and European cuisine from 7:00 until 23:00 hrs.

name: Garden Home Kata
description: A 5-minute ride from the white sands of Kata Beach, Garden Home Kata features cosy accommodation surrounded by the lush tropical greenery. It boasts an outdoor pool and free Wi-Fi which is available throughout the hotel. For convenience, on-site parking and a laundry service are provided. Karon Beach is a 10-minute ride from Garden Home Kata, while Kata View Point is a 15-minute ride away. A 45-minute drive takes guests to Phuket International Airport. All the non-smoking rooms offer air conditioning, a satellite TV and a private balcony. Their en suite bathrooms are fitted with hot and cold shower facilities. For meals, head to nearby restaurants which are located 200 metre away from the property.

name: The Album Loft
description: The Album Loft @ Nanai Road offers stylish serviced residence along quiet Nanai Road in Patong. It is located 15 km away from Phuket Town. The Loft Album @ Nanai Road is 34 km from Phuket International Airport. The famous Night Market is just 5 minutes’ drive away. Rooms are fully air conditioned and come with private balconies. Each is equipped with a cable TV and DVD player. Selected rooms come with kitchen facilities and living rooms. Guests may soak up the sun by the outdoor pool or make use of the free Wi-Fi to surf the net. Day trips are easily arranged at the tour desk. The Album Loft @ Nanai Road also provides laundry services and car rentals. Delicious Thai and international dishes are served at the hotel’s restaurant.

name: Sunsuri Phuket (Sha Plus+)
description: Located in the secluded area of Nai Harn Beach, the property is a 10-minute ride from Rawai Beach and Promthep Cape. Sunsuri Phuket features cosy accommodation with two outdoor pools, purpose built kids pool and kids club. Free WiFi is offered in the entire resort. Set on a hillside, Sunsuri Phuket is a 30-minute drive from Phuket Town and Central Festival Phuket Shopping Centre. Phuket International Airport is a 50-minute ride away. A free scheduled shuttle service to the popular Patong Beach area is available. Beautifully decorated rooms have air conditioning, a cable TV and a private balcony. En suite bathrooms offer free toiletries and slippers. Guests can workout in the fully-equipped gym or relax with pampering massage treatments at the spa. For convenience, the resort offers a 24-hour front desk, meeting facilities and library. The on-site restaurant serves international cuisine, while a variety of drinks can be enjoyed at the wine bar. Room service is available around the clock.

name: My Style Resort Hotel
description: Located in Patong Beach, 1.2 km from Patong Beach, My Style Resort Hotel -SHA Plus provides accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a shared lounge and a restaurant. This 3-star hotel offers room service and a concierge service. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, a shared kitchen and free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a kettle, a fridge, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a terrace and a private bathroom with a shower. My Style Resort Hotel -SHA Plus features certain rooms with sea views, and every room comes with a balcony. All units include a wardrobe. A continental breakfast is available daily at the accommodation. Kalim Beach is 2.6 km from My Style Resort Hotel -SHA Plus, while Patong Boxing Stadium is 300 metres away. The nearest airport is Phuket International Airport, 35 km from the hotel.

name: Phuket Chinoinn-Shaplus Certified
description: Located in Phuket Town, 1.4 km from Thai Hua Museum, Phuket Chinoinn-SHAPlus Certified provides accommodation with a garden, free private parking and a restaurant. Built in 2015, this 3-star hotel is within 1.3 km of Chinpracha House and 5.8 km of Prince of Songkla University. The hotel features an indoor pool, a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi. At the hotel every room is fitted with air conditioning, a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen, towels and a terrace with a city view. All units will provide guests with a fridge. Phuket Chinoinn-SHAPlus Certified offers an American or Asian breakfast. Chalong Temple is 8.4 km from the accommodation, while Chalong Pier is 9.2 km away. The nearest airport is Phuket International Airport, 32 km from Phuket Chinoinn-SHAPlus Certified.

name: Paripas Patong Resort (Sha Plus+)
description: Situated less than a 5-minute walk from Patong Beach, Paripas Patong Resort boasts two outdoor pools, a sun terrace and a fitness centre. Free WiFi is also provided in all areas for guests to stay connected. Rooms at Paripas Patong Resort comes with air conditioning, Cable TV and a safety deposit box. Extras include a refrigerator and a balcony with city or mountain views. Each room also come with an en suite bathroom fitted with shower facilities and free toiletries. Guests will be welcomed by the helpful staff at the 24-hour front desk. Sightseeing trips, car and motorbike rentals as well as taxi services can all be arranged by the on-site staff for an extra charge. Laundry services are available upon request. Located in the centre of Patong, guests can visit many attractions within a short walk from the property. It is 1.1 km from Jungceylon Shopping Center and only 1.3 km fro the lively Bangla Road. Phuket International Airport is approximately a 1-hour drive away.

name: Byd Lofts - Boutique Hotel & Serviced Apartments - Patong Beach, Phuket
description: Just a 5-minute walk from Patong Beach, BYD Lofts - Boutique Hotel & Serviced Apartments - Patong Beach, Phuket - SHA Plus offers stylish serviced apartments surrounded by shopping and nightlife options. It features a rooftop pool and free WiFi in the entire property. BYD Lofts - Boutique Hotel & Serviced Apartments - Patong Beach, Phuket - SHA Plus is within a 10-minute walk or a 2-minute Tuk Tuk drive of Jungceylon Shopping Mall and Bangla Road. It is a 40-minute drive from the Phuket International Airport. Well-furnished modern apartments at BYD Lofts - Boutique Hotel & Serviced Apartments - Patong Beach, Phuket - SHA Plus feature a separate living area with a 4K - 55-inch Smart TV and iPod docking station. Extras include home theater system and internet TV. For convenience, the European kitchen is equipped with cutlery, crockery and pans. An espresso coffee machine is also available in the room. Guests can relax with the massage treatments provided or take a dip in the outdoor rooftop swimming pool. A tour desk provides information on local attractions and car rental service. Enjoy hot meals at Restaurant Bistro and Bar@BYD Lofts. Alternatively, an extensive selection of wines, cold cuts and cheese are available at Wine Connection Deli Shop.

name: Park 38 Hotel - Sha Plus
description: With a stay at Park 38 Hotel in Wichit, you'll be within a 10-minute walk of Phuket International Hospital and Central Festival Phuket Shopping Center. Featured amenities include dry cleaning/laundry services, luggage storage, and laundry facilities. Free self parking is available onsite.Hotels.com

name: 7Q Patong Beach Hotel
description: Modern yet affordable, 7Q Resident is located in the heart of Patong, just 2 minutes' walk from Patong Beach. Aside from an infinity pool, it also has free Wi-Fi and parking. 7Q Resident is a 45-minute drive from Phuket International Airport. Jungceylon Shopping Centre and nightlife options at Soi Bangla are a 5-minute drive from the hotel. Fully air-conditioned, the stylish rooms at 7Q are fitted with a flat-screen cable TV and DVD player. Each also comes with a personal safe and tea/coffee making facilities. The tour desk helps guests with travel arrangements. Car rental and chargeable shuttle services make it easy to get around Phuket. International and Thai specialities can be sampled at the restaurant, while refreshing drinks can be enjoyed at the Pool Bar. A daily buffet breakfast is also available.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Phuket Banthai Resort (SHA Plus+)
description: Step into tranquility when you check in to DoubleTree by Hilton Phuket Banthai Resort. Set in the heart of Patong, directly opposite the white sandy beach and turquoise waters of the Andaman Sea, we offer close proximity to the lively local area while providing a calming retreat from the hustle and bustle. Explore local markets, shopping malls, and the famous Patong nightlife, or relax inside and soak up the soothing resort ambience. Feel welcomed with a warm DoubleTree Chocolate Chip Cookie upon arrival, then relax in your spacious room or suite. All rooms offer a private balcony or terrace area overlooking lush tropical gardens and one of the three hotel pools. Thoughtful amenities include an HDTV, WiFi, mini-refrigerator and tea and coffee-making facilities, and all bathrooms feature an elegant bathtub shower or walk in shower. Leisure options abound at DoubleTree by Hilton Phuket Banthai Resort. Enjoy a workout in our 24/7 fitness center, or take a dip in one of three outdoor pools, featuring swim-up bars with submerged seating. When you’re ready to be pampered, relax with a treatment in our deluxe spa. Our hotel in Patong offers great dining options. Enjoy the freshest seafood and local Thai and international cuisine at Port Restaurant, or chill at the laid-back al fresco Blah Blah bar with an ice-cold beer. Unwind at Lobby Bar with light snacks and handcrafted cocktails, or dine in the comfort of your room with 24/7 in-room dining.Hilton

name: Chabana Kamala Hotel
description: Located a 5-minute walk from the beach, Chabana Kamala Hotel boasts an outdoor pool and free WiFi access in public areas. With shops, bars and restaurants nearby, this hotel is 1 km from Phuket FantaSea. The bustling centre and nightlife of Patong is a 15-minute drive across the hill. Phuket International Airport is a 40-minute drive away. Air-conditioned rooms feature a flat-screen TV, a desk and a safety deposit box. They also have a minibar and an electric kettle. A shower and free toiletries are provided in the en suite bathroom. Services and facilities at Chabana Kamala Hotel include a laundry and a 24-hour reception. Guests can also enjoy a pampering treatment at their spa. Thai and international dishes are served at the hotel's restaurant.

name: Pimrada Hotel
description: A 15-minute walk from Patong Beach and Jungceylon Shopping Mall, Pimrada Hotel offers rooms with flat-screen TVs. Providing free Wi-Fi, it also features a CCTV system, a tour desk and a 24-hour reception with luggage storage facilities. Decorated with local fabrics, the air-conditioned rooms have flat-screen cable TV, a fridge, and a safety deposit box. Each room has a private bathroom with toiletries and a shower. Pimrada Hotel is a 20-minute drive from Kata Beach and Karon Beach. It is a 45-minute drive from Phuket International Airport. Services include airport transfers, shuttle services, and ticket bookings. Car rentals and laundry services are also available. For dining, guests can find Thai and international restaurants within a 5-minute walk from the hotel.

name: Nanachart Mansion
address: 41/34 Mootri Road, Talad Yai, Muang, Phuket City 83000
description: With a stay at Nanachart Mansion in Phuket, you'll be 6.1 mi (9.8 km) from Chalong Temple and 7.6 mi (12.2 km) from Phuket Aquarium. This hotel is 8.9 mi (14.2 km) from Bangla Road and 8.9 mi (14.4 km) from Patong Beach. Featured amenities include a computer station, a 24-hour front desk, and luggage storage. Free self parking is available onsite. Make yourself at home in one of the 45 guestrooms. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment. Bathrooms with showers are provided.FarePortal

name: The Front Hotel and Apartments
description: Featuring an outdoor pool facing the ocean, The Front hotel and apartments is situated just across the street from a peaceful spot on Patong Beach. It offers modern sea-facing room and free Wi-Fi. The spacious air-conditioned rooms and apartments feature cement finishes, a flat-screen cable TV and DVD player. Some rooms have a private balcony. They come with daily cleaning and bottled water. Steps from the Patong Beach beachfront, The Front Hotel and apartments is an easy stroll from the nearest minimart. It s a 45-minute drive from Phuket International Airport. Guests can enjoy a relaxing poolside massage or explore Phuket with a day trip. Staff at the 24-hour front desk can provide concierge and childcare services. Light meals and refreshing cocktails are served at the pool bar. Room service is also available.

name: Kamala Beachfront Apartment
description: Located on Kamala Beach, a 5-minute walk from Phuket Fantasea, Kamala Beachfront Apartment offers well-appointed apartments. It boasts a saltwater pool with a hot tub and panorama views of the Andaman Sea. The Kamala Beachfront Apartment is a 30-minute drive from Phuket International Airport and 10 minutes from Kamala Village. It takes 30 minutes by car to Phuket Town. Apartments are luxurious with fine beddings and facilities like DVD players, air conditioning and an electronic safe. They all come with an open-concept living room with a dining area. They have well-equipped kitchens with microwave and a fridge. The hotel provides massage services, as well as, a tour desk for guests who wish to explore the area. Babysitting services are provided for convenience. Prime Kitchen is the hotel’s beachfront restaurant, which serves traditional Thai food. Meals can also be enjoyed in the comfort of guests’ rooms.

name: Outrigger Surin Beach Resort
description: Located in Cherngtalay, Manathai Surin Phuket provides modern 4-star accommodation, as well as an indoor pool and free Wi-Fi. The various facilities this stylish hotel offers include massage services, a coffee bar and a 24-hour reception. This cosy hotel provides family facilities, such as babysitting/child services. In addition, the multilingual staff are on hand to provide local information. Rooms have a modern décor, air-conditioning and bottled water. There are a variety of cafés and restaurants near Manathai Surin Phuket, and Kamala and Patong are an easy car trip away. The helpful staff at the tour desk are available to book tours and sightseeing trips in Cherngtalay.Revato

name: Princess Seaview Resort & Spa
description: Providing a free half-hourly shuttle to Karon Beach, Princess Seaview Resort & Spa in Phuket offers a rooftop outdoor pool. Its spacious rooms have a private balcony with views of the sea or Karon Town. Fully air-conditioned, rooms are equipped with a flat-screen TV, electric kettle and free bottled water. See-through glass bathrooms come with a separate bathtub and hot-water showers. Princess Seaview Resort is a 15-minute drive from Patong Beach and a 20-minute drive from Phuket Town. It is a 45-minute drive from Phuket International Airport. Free parking is available. The large outdoor pool is surrounded by sun loungers, where guests can suntan while enjoying a cocktail or burger from the pool bar. For guests' convenience, there is also a fitness centre and laundry services. Princess Restaurant & Bar serves a daily buffet breakfast, as well as international, Thai and seafood specialities.

name: Hotel Sole
description: Hotel Sole is 300 metres from the city centre. It is a 5-minute walk from Jungceylon Shopping Centre and a 10-minute walk from Patong Beach. Offering a spa bath and restaurant, it features modern, Thai-style rooms with free Wi-Fi. Air-conditioned rooms are also fitted with tiled flooring and Thai-style wooden furniture. Cable TV and a minibar are provided. Some rooms come with a private balcony. En suite bathrooms offer a non-slip tile and a rain shower. The Hotel Sole’s restaurant serves Italian and Thai dishes and offers room service. The bar serves a variety of drinks in a relaxing atmosphere. Travel arrangements can be made at Sole’s tour desk. Alternatively, motorbike rentals are available for guests who wish to explore the area. Drivers can park for free here. Beach towels are also provided for free.

name: Sugar Marina Resort - Nautical – Kata Beach (SHA Plus+)
description: A 5-minute walk from the white sands of Kata Beach, Sugar Marina Hotel - NAUTICAL - Kata Beach - SHA plus Kata Beachoffers cosy accommodation with modern facilities and private balconies. It boasts an outdoor pool, a 24-hour front desk and on-site parking service. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the resort. Sugar Marina Hotel - NAUTICAL - Kata Beach - SHA plus Kata Beach is a 20-minute ride from the well known Patong Beach. It is a 35-minute drive from Phuket Town and a 50-minute drive from Phuket International Airport. Stylish air-conditioned rooms at this resort are provided with a flat-screen TV, a sofa seating area and tea/coffee making facilities. En suite bathrooms offer a bathtub with views and separate shower facilities. Mamarine Restaurant offers delightful a-la-carte menus of Thai cuisine.

name: Avani+ Mai Khao Phuket Suites & Villas (Sha Plus+)
address: 887 Moo 3, Tumbon Mai Khao, Amphur Thalang, Mai Khao 83110
description: Avani+ Mai Khao Phuket Suites & Villas SHA Plus+ is situated in Mai Khao and features free Wi-Fi. In addition to free private parking on site, the hotel offers comfortable 5-star rooms and a bar. Recreational facilities at Avani+ Mai Khao Phuket Suites & Villas SHA Plus+ include a swimming pool and a pool table. For those travelling with children Avani+ Mai Khao Phuket Suites & Villas SHA Plus+ offers babysitting/child services, a kids club and a children's play area. Rooms at the hotel include a rain shower and a private balcony. Meals can be made in the equipped kitchenette and enjoyed in the dining area. Avani+ Mai Khao Phuket Suites & Villas SHA Plus+ boasts convenient dining options, including international and Thai cuisines at La Sala and Japanese meals at Tree House. Breakfast is available each morning and can be savoured in the comfort of the rooms. Just a short drive from Nai Yang Beach and Phuket International Airport, the hotel provides an airport shuttle service. It is conveniently situated just moments from Sirinat National Park.Revato

name: Phuket View Coffee and Resort
address: 56/10 Moo. 5 Baan Nai Trok Road, Chalong 83130
description: Situated in Chalong, 4.8 km from Chalong Temple, Phuket View Coffee and Resort features accommodation with a terrace, free private parking and a restaurant. With free WiFi, this 3-star hotel offers room service and a concierge service. Guests can enjoy mountain views. At the hotel, the rooms include a balcony with a sea view. Complete with a private bathroom fitted with free toiletries, all rooms at Phuket View Coffee and Resort have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and some rooms are fitted with a patio. The accommodation offers an American or Asian breakfast. Phuket Simon Cabaret is 8.2 km from Phuket View Coffee and Resort, while Chalong Pier is 8.3 km from the property. The nearest airport is Phuket International, 38 km from the hotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Anda Beachside Hotel
description: Stop at Anda Beachside Hotel to discover the wonders of Phuket. Both business travelers and tourists can enjoy the hotel's facilities and services. Service-minded staff will welcome and guide you at the Anda Beachside Hotel. Some of the well-appointed guestrooms feature television LCD/plasma screen, cleaning products, clothes rack, complimentary instant coffee, complimentary tea. The hotel offers various recreational opportunities. Discover all Phuket has to offer by making Anda Beachside Hotel your base.priceline.com

name: Cape Panwa Hotel (SHA Plus+)
description: Cape Panwa Hotel where a long, sandy, private beach and the nearby shade of the hillside coconut plantation enhance a truly tropical feel. Relaxing in the generous comfort of your fully-appointed suite or simply strolling hand-in-hand next to gently rippling wavelets, feel the stresses and strains of everyday life just melt away. Cape Panwa Hotel, a former haunt of royalty and current favorite of ‘A’-listers, retains the warmest of welcomes where everyone can feel treated like a very special visitor, thanks to the care and attentions of a staff of whom we are truly proud. A short hop from Phuket town, Cape Panwa Hotel offers all the services and facilities you would expect of a Cape property, with a range of restaurants to suit all tastes and the renowned Cape Spa. It is also an ideal venue for weddings or other celebrations under the caring and expert guidance of our dedicated Function Planner and the team. This is the venue to get back in touch with nature, with each other or just with yourself. Whether for a short family break or a working holiday, Cape Panwa wins hands-down every time.

name: Layalina Hotel
description: Right on Kamala Beach, Layalina Hotel offers spacious rooms with sea views, a minibar and a bathtub. Traditional Thai massages and an outdoor pool are featured. Free WiFi is provided throughout the hotel. The air-conditioned rooms at Layalina Hotel feature a striking wood-and-white decor. Each comes with a flat-screen TV. Guests can enjoy magnificent sunrises over the Andaman Sea, then unwind in Phuket’s perfect weather on the hotel’s sun terrace. Patong Beach is 4 km away, and the hotel is a 45-minute drive from Phuket Airport.

name: Rosewood Phuket (SHA Plus+)
description: Located in Tri Trang Beach in Phuket, Rosewood Phuket features an outdoor pool and water sports facilities. The resort boasts views of the sea, and guests can enjoy contemporary dining experiences at an Italian inspired restaurant. Rooms have a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. Certain units include a seating area for your convenience. You will find a coffee machine and a kettle in the room. Every room has a private bathroom equipped with a bath. For your comfort, you will find bathrobes, slippers and free toiletries. There is a 24-hour front desk at the property. Free use of bicycles is available at this resort and the area is popular for cycling. Emerald Bay are 600 metres from Rosewood Phuket, while Jungceylon Shopping Center is 4.5 km from the property. The nearest airport is Phuket International Airport, 40 km from Rosewood Phuket.

name: Grand Orlov
description: Situated in Patong Beach, a few steps from Patong Beach, Grand Orlov features accommodation with a shared lounge, free private parking and a terrace. This 3-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk and luggage storage space. Guests can enjoy city views. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a coffee machine, a fridge, a microwave, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a balcony and a private bathroom with a shower. Grand Orlov provides some units with mountain views, and rooms are fitted with a kettle. At the accommodation the rooms have bed linen and towels. Popular points of interest near Grand Orlov include Kalim Beach, Patong Boxing Stadium and Jungceylon Shopping Center. The nearest airport is Phuket International Airport, 35 km from the hotel.

name: Ozo Phuket (Sha Plus+)
description: Boasting a swimming pool, OZO Phuket SHA Plus+ is located in Karon and offers comfortable accommodation. Some of the popular facilities provided at this 4-star resort include complimentary on-site parking and wireless internet. There are a range of amenities available to those staying at OZO Phuket SHA Plus+, such as a kids pool, a 24-hour reception and supervised child care/activities. Airport transfers, a dry cleaning service, babysitting/child services and a laundry service are available on enquiry. All rooms are air conditioned and equipped with a flat-screen TV, a refrigerator and a hair dryer. All provide a seating area, an in-room safe and a private bathroom. Guests staying at OZO Phuket SHA Plus+ can enjoy a unique dining experience at the on-site restaurant, suitably based for those who want to stay close at mealtime. The resort is within a short walk of Kata Beach. Karon Beach is also nearby.Revato

name: The Way Patong Hotel
address: 66/26 Soi Veerakit Nanai Road, Phuket City 83150
description: Situated in Patong Beach, 1.4 km from Patong Beach, The Way Patong Hotel features accommodation with a shared lounge, free private parking and a terrace. The 3-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with a private bathroom and free WiFi. Guests can have a drink at the snack bar. The rooms in the hotel are fitted with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. At The Way Patong Hotel rooms are equipped with bed linen and towels. Jungceylon Shopping Center is 700 metres from the accommodation, while Patong Boxing Stadium is less than 1 km from the property. The nearest airport is Phuket International Airport, 35 km from The Way Patong Hotel.

name: Central Residences
description: Central Residence is only a 5-mins drive from Central Festival Phuket Department Store and Phuket Town Centre. It offers comfortable and clean rooms with air conditioning. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the property. A coin-operated washing machine and free on-site parking are provided. The famous Patong Beach is a 20-minute ride from Central Residence. Phuket International Airport can be reached within a 30-minute ride away. Simply furnished rooms have a TV, a fridge and a private balcony. En suite bathrooms come with shower facilities. Guests can enjoy local delicacies and seafood dishes at nearby restaurants located within a 5-minute walk from the residence.

name: Tee Pak Dee Resident Phuket
address: 22/54-56 Luang-Por Wat Chalong Road, Phuket City 83000
description: Tee Pak Dee Resident Phuket is located in Phuket Town, 1.3 km from Thai Hua Museum and 1.5 km from Chinpracha House. Each accommodation at the 3-star hotel has city views, and guests can enjoy access to a garden and to a shared lounge. The hotel also provides free WiFi as well as a paid airport shuttle service. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a coffee machine, a fridge, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a terrace and a private bathroom with a bidet. Every room has a kettle, while certain rooms here will provide you with a balcony and others also provide guests with garden views. All units in Tee Pak Dee Resident Phuket are equipped with free toiletries and a computer. Prince of Songkla University is 6.5 km from the accommodation, while Chalong Temple is 10 km away. The nearest airport is Phuket International Airport, 31 km from Tee Pak Dee Resident Phuket.

name: The Nai Harn (SHA Plus+)
description: Set in Rawai, The Nai Harn is a five-minute walk from Nai Harn Beach and offers an infinity pool, outdoor tennis courts and a sauna. Featuring views of Promthep Cape, it also provides a variety of amenities, including a butler service, a rooftop terrace and valet parking. Those staying at this 5-star hotel can plan excursions with the assistance of the tour desk. It also offers babysitting services, a currency exchange and a reception that operates 24/7. The rooms at The Nai Harn have air conditioning and offer a private balcony, a coffee maker and a mini bar. They each include converters/voltage adaptors, a flat-screen TV and bottled water. The hotel offers a variety of in-house dining options with Cosmo all-day-dining restaurant & Rock Salt beach restaurant and Reflections "sprawling infinity-edged rooftop bar". Breakfast is available daily and can be savoured in the comfort of the rooms. Phuket International Airport is a 70-minute drive from The Nai Harn. Karon and Chalong are also a short drive away.Revato

name: Phuket 346
address: 9 Soi Rommanee, Thaladyai, Mueng, Phuket City 83000
description: The 2-star Phuket 346 offers comfort and convenience whether you're on business or holiday in Phuket. Featuring a complete list of amenities, guests will find their stay at the property a comfortable one. Service-minded staff will welcome and guide you at the Phuket 346. Guestrooms are fitted with all the amenities you need for a good night's sleep. In some of the rooms, guests can find internet access – wireless, internet access – wireless (complimentary), non smoking rooms, air conditioning, desk. The hotel offers various recreational opportunities. Friendly staff, great facilities and close proximity to all that Phuket has to offer are three great reasons you should stay at Phuket 346.Agoda

name: Pure Phuket Residence
address: 3/7 Rasada Rd., Talat Nuea, Phuket City 83000
description: Situated in central Phuket Town, Pure Phuket Residence features air-conditioned accommodation, less than a 5-minute drive from the local Bus Station. The hotel houses a coffee shop and provides Wi-Fi access. Fitted with tiled flooring, simply furnished rooms feature a cream and white colour scheme. They offer a TV with cable channels and a private bathroom with hot and cold shower facilities. A minibar is included. Located on Chaofa Road, Pure Mansion is 17 km from Patong Beach. Kata and Karon beaches are 20 km away. The hotel is a 45-minute drive from Phuket International Airport. Guests can make travel arrangements to explore the surrounding area. Personal belongings can be stored at the safety deposit box at reception. Laundry and fax services are also available.

name: Seven Seas Hotel
description: Seven Seas Hotel is located on the quiet end of Patong Beach, just 50 metres from the seashore. Free Wi-Fi is provided. Air-conditioned rooms at Seven Seas come with a private balcony offering views of the hillside, seaview or the pool. Each room has cable TV, a safety deposit box, and a minibar. Private bathrooms provide a hot and cold shower. The hotel offers car rentals, while day trips can be arranged at the tour desk. Staff at the 24-hour front desk can help with laundry and fax services. Guests can enjoy local and Western dishes at the restaurant. Hotel Seven Seas is a 10-minute walk from the restaurants and shops in Patong. Phuket International Airport is a 45-minute drive away.

name: Andaman Beach Hotel Phuket - Handwritten Collection
description: Discover Andaman Beach Hotel Phuket - Handwritten Collection, a captivating island retreat celebrated for its breathtaking beaches, vibrant culture, and boundless adventures. Immerse in beauty, savor flavors, and craft cherished memories in this tropicalsanctuary. Welcome to your unforgettable experience.accorhotels.com

name: C.A.P Mansion
description: Featuring an outdoor pool and a restaurant with all-day dining, C.A.P. Mansion Hotel offers air-conditioned rooms with cable TV. It has free wired internet in public areas and sauna facilities. C.A.P. Mansion is less than a 5-minute walk to the weekend market and a 5-minute drive to Phuket Central Festival. Chalong Pier is a 20-minute drive away. It is a 35-minute drive to Phuket International Airport. Free parking is available. Boasting a private balcony, rooms offer spacious layouts, a fridge and dresser. An attached bathroom comes with shower facilities. For leisure, guests can rent a motorcycle from the front desk to explore the surrounding region. Added conveniences include airport shuttle and laundry services.

name: Three Monkeys Villas
description: Boasting a year-round outdoor pool, Three Monkeys Villas in Patong Beach features accommodation with free WiFi and free private parking for guests who drive. The accommodation is air conditioned and features a hot tub. The villa provides guests with a terrace, city views, a seating area, a flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen with a fridge and a microwave, and a private bathroom with bidet and free toiletries. A balcony with mountain views is offered in each unit. Three Monkeys Villas offers a hot tub. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Patong Beach, Patong Boxing Stadium and Jungceylon Shopping Center. The nearest airport is Phuket International, 35 km from Three Monkeys Villas, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Aquarius Gay Guesthouse & Sauna
description: The 3-star Aquarius Gay Guesthouse and Sauna offers comfort and convenience whether you're on business or holiday in Phuket. The hotel offers guests a range of services and amenities designed to provide comfort and convenience. Take advantage of the hotel's free Wi-Fi in all rooms, private check in/check out, daily housekeeping, taxi service, 24-hour security. Some of the well-appointed guestrooms feature television LCD/plasma screen, complimentary instant coffee, complimentary tea, linens, mirror. The hotel offers various recreational opportunities. A welcoming atmosphere and excellent service are what you can expect during your stay at Aquarius Gay Guesthouse and Sauna.Agoda

name: Phuket Island View Hotel (SHA Plus+)
description: Situated on Karon Beach, Phuket Island View offers rooms with private balconies amidst a tropical garden. The hotel features 3 outdoor swimming pools, a spa and a restaurant. Island View Phuket is a short stroll from the shops and nightlife of Karon and Kata Central. The lively Patong Beach is a 15-minute walk from the hotel. Decorated in a contemporary Thai design, rooms are spacious and bright. They feature tiled flooring and air-conditioning, and are equipped with satellite TV and a fridge. Guests at Island View can relax in the hot tub or unwind with a massage and body treatment. The hotel offers a tour desk and car and motor bicycle rental services. The Seabreeze Restaurant offers outdoor dining, serving local and Western food. Snacks and refreshments can also be enjoyed at the Beach Bar and the Pool Bar.
